events.title: Tatsugiri splashes into Pokémon GO during the Water Festival event!
events.subtitle: Water Festival
bonuses:
Rainy Lure Modules will last for two hours.
Increased Candy for Nice Throws or better.
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Staryu and Shiny Tirtouga.
Lapras wearing a scarf caught from raids may have a Seasonal special background—if you’re lucky!

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            July 3, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Tatsugiri splashes into Pokémon GO during the Water Festival event!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Tatsugiri splashes into Pokémon GO during the Water Festival event!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a11380dGS8sFqsgHoty0x1Wr5yTWs7HztKAyaptOa6CCmetA_GTleXTqyW5ZPPmnVwtg5H5W6h4_bjKWK7NubVD7ZI0dpaPLYZhqlUdR9jOmbA=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Water Festival</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Tuesday, July 15, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, July 20, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon Debuts</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The Mimicry Pokémon Tatsugiri will make its Pokémon GO debut!</p>
<p>Curly Form Tatsugiri (Europe, Middle East, Africa)<br>Droopy Form Tatsugiri (Americas)<br>Stretchy Form Tatsugiri (Asia-Pacific)</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li>Rainy Lure Modules will last for two hours.</li>
<li>Increased Candy for Nice Throws or better.</li>
<li>Increased chance to encounter Shiny Staryu and Shiny Tirtouga.</li>
<li>Lapras wearing a scarf caught from raids may have a Seasonal special background—if you’re lucky!</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Wild Encounters</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear more frequently in the wild.</p>
<p>Squirtle*<br>Slowpoke*<br>Krabby*<br>Staryu*<br>Magikarp*<br>Marill*<br>Barboach*<br>Clamperl*<br>Buizel*<br>Finneon*<br>Wimpod*</p>
<p>Some Trainers might even encounter the following!</p>
<p>Lanturn<br>Feebas*<br>Palpitoad<br>Tirtouga*</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Raids</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear in raids.</p>
<p><strong>One-Star Raids</strong><br>Shellder*<br>Ducklett*<br>Curly Form Tatsugiri (Europe, Middle East, Africa)<br>Droopy Form Tatsugiri (Americas)<br>Stretchy Form Tatsugiri (Asia-Pacific)</p>
<p><strong>Three-Star Raids</strong><br>Kingler<br>Gyarados*<br>Lapras wearing a scarf*<br>Azumarill</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Field Research Task Rewards</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Event-themed Field Research tasks will be available.</p>
<p>Complete Field Research tasks to earn Mega Energy and encounters with event-themed Pokémon.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Paid Timed Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>For US$4.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access event-exclusive Timed Research.</p>
<p>Timed Research rewards include the following.</p>
<ul>
<li>One Rainy Lure Module</li>
<li>An event-themed avatar pose</li>
<li>Encounters with event-themed Pokémon, including Gyarados, Lapras wearing a scarf, and more!</li>
</ul>
<p>Trainers will be able to purchase and gift tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with. Please note that purchases—including those made for other Trainers—are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">

originalPost.title: Hisuian Lilligant makes its hearty Pokémon GO debut in a flowery Raid Day!
originalPost.html:

GO FestBuy TicketsAbout GO FestOsakaJersey CityParisGlobalNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode RedemptionEnglishDeutschEspañolEspañol (México)Françaisहिन्दीBahasa IndonesiaItalianoPolskiPortuguês日本語한국어РусскийไทยTürkçe中文

15% discount for your first Pokémon GO Web Store purchase on any item $9.99 or more!
Updates
Hisuian Lilligant makes its hearty Pokémon GO debut in a flowery Raid Day!

Hisuian Lilligant Raid Day

Saturday, July 12, 2025, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time

Pokémon Debut

The following Pokémon will make its Pokémon GO debut in raids!

Hisuian Lilligant*

*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!

Event Bonuses

  • Remote Raid Pass limit increased to 20 from Friday, July 11, at 5:00 p.m. to Saturday, July 12, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. PDT.
  • Receive up to five additional free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a total of six).
  • Increased chance of encountering Shiny Hisuian Lilligant from raids.

Event Ticket

For US$4.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you can purchase a ticket that grants the following bonuses.

  • Eight additional Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a daily total of 14)
  • Increased chance to get Rare Candy XL from Raid Battles for Trainers level 31 and up
  • 50% more XP from Raid Battles
  • 2× Stardust from Raid Battles

These bonuses will be effective on Saturday, July 12, 2025, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.

Trainers will be able to purchase and gift tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with. Please note that purchases—including those made for other Trainers—are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.

*Please note that this ticket will only be available in the in-game shop until Saturday, July 12, 2025, at 5:00 p.m. local time.

Pokémon GO Web Store – Hisuian Lilligant Raid Day Ultra Ticket Box

The Hisuian Lilligant Raid Day Ultra Ticket Box will be available for US$4.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency) and includes both an event ticket and a bonus Premium Battle Pass at no additional cost!

Check it out in the Pokémon GO Web Store!

Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.

—The Pokémon GO team

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            July 2, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Honedge slashes into Pokémon GO during Ultra Unlock: Steel and Scales!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Honedge slashes into Pokémon GO during Ultra Unlock: Steel and Scales!
" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/LNJ8_5As3RG7VRa87VN8fFtEFB7xLwFm3z492WdIMhSlhww4Wx8HXSAUSkDcbJXLb5EhKT4sMLsnZ315sKZcoABnX1hWE5-vaY7bqnsBhYTttA=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Ultra Unlock: Steel and Scales</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Tuesday, July 22, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, July 27, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon Debuts</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon first discovered in the Kalos region will make their Pokémon GO debuts!</p>
<p>Honedge<br>Doublade<br>Aegislash</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body--md"><ul>
<li>You can use 25 Honedge Candy to evolve Honedge into Doublade and 100 Honedge Candy to evolve Doublade into Aegislash.</li>
</ul>
</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li>4× XP for catching Pokémon.</li>
<li>4× Stardust for catching Pokémon.</li>
<li>Increased chance to encounter Shiny Bagon and Shiny Beldum.</li>
<li>Increased chance to encounter Shiny Unown U in raids.</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">GO Battle League</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>During the event, Honedge will appear in both GO Battle League reward tracks starting at Rank 6. It will appear more frequently in the premium track.</p>
<p>After the event, Honedge will appear  in both GO Battle League reward tracks starting at Rank 16. It will appear more frequently in the premium track.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Wild Encounters</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear more frequently in the wild. Also, for the first time in Pokémon GO, you’ll be able to encounter Shiny Rookidee—if you’re lucky!</p>
<p>Magnemite*<br>Dratini*<br>Aron*<br>Bagon*<br>Beldum*<br>Ferroseed*<br>Noibat*<br>Rookidee*</p>
<p>Some Trainers might even encounter the following!</p>
<p>Axew*<br>Goomy*</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Raids</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear in raids.</p>
<p><strong>One-Star Raids</strong><br>Unown U*<br>Gible*<br>Klink*<br>Deino*<br>Honedge</p>
<p><strong>Three-Star Raids</strong><br>Skarmory*<br>Bisharp<br>Dragalge<br>Turtonator*</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Field Research Task Rewards</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Event-themed Field Research tasks will be available. Complete these tasks to earn XP, Stardust, and encounters with event-themed Pokémon.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Collection Challenges</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Complete Collection Challenges to receive XP, Stardust, and encounters with event-themed Pokémon.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Web Store</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>There’s a new way to log in to the <a href="https://store.pokemongo.com/?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=ultra-unlock-hisui-2025">Pokémon GO Web Store</a>! Visit the web store from your mobile device and select “Sign in with Pokémon GO” to be logged in to our new and improved store.</p>
<p>Don’t forget, Trainers, you get double the Reward Points on eligible purchases when you shop with the Pokémon GO Web Store!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.</p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

            </div>

events.title: Hisuian Zorua emerges from the shadows for Ultra Unlock: Hisui Celebration!
events.subtitle: Ultra Unlock: Hisui Celebration
bonuses:
4× XP for catching Pokémon.
4× Stardust for catching Pokémon.
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Hisuian Voltorb and Shiny Hisuian Qwilfish.
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Unown U from raids.
A special Collection Challenge will be available starting during the event. You can complete it by catching Pokémon that appear from space-time anomalies.

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            June 30, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Hisuian Zorua emerges from the shadows for Ultra Unlock: Hisui Celebration!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Hisuian Zorua emerges from the shadows for Ultra Unlock: Hisui Celebration!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/0YjUjezdcrgqW-kM7QzKA71TZ8GftLVML3utqE0cly80kQUSlMKVSodiyLrOrAl9bDtAeS2q3o8m8OMUSMfnSgZs6vcoDzz62ZehmnEc0W8TKw=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Ultra Unlock: Hisui Celebration</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Tuesday, July 8, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, July 13, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon Debuts</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The Spiteful Fox Pokémon Hisuian Zorua and its Evolution, Hisuian Zoroark, will make their Pokémon GO debuts!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body--md"><ul>
<li>You can use 50 Zorua Candy to evolve Hisuian Zorua into Hisuian Zoroark.</li>
</ul>
</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Space-Time Anomalies Return!</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Keep an eye on the sky for mysterious phenomena appearing during this event—space-time anomalies are connecting our world to the distant past, and you might encounter different Pokémon when they appear.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li>4× XP for catching Pokémon.</li>
<li>4× Stardust for catching Pokémon.</li>
<li>Increased chance to encounter Shiny Hisuian Voltorb and Shiny Hisuian Qwilfish.</li>
<li>Increased chance to encounter Shiny Unown U from raids.</li>
<li>A special Collection Challenge will be available starting during the event. You can complete it by catching Pokémon that appear from space-time anomalies.</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Wild Encounters</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Zubat*<br>Hisuian Voltorb*<br>Magikarp*<br>Hisuian Qwilfish*<br>Starly*<br>Croagunk*<br>Petilil*<br>Hisuian Zorua<br>Rufflet*<br>Bergmite*</p>
<p>Some Trainers might even encounter the following!</p>
<p>Sneasel*<br>Larvitar*<br>Bagon*</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Raids</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear in raids.</p>
<p><strong>One-Star Raids</strong><br>Hisuian Growlithe*<br>Unown U*<br>Hisuian Sneasel*</p>
<p><strong>Three-Star Raids</strong><br>Hisuian Braviary*<br>Hisuian Avalugg*<br>Wyrdeer*<br>Kleavor*</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Field Research Task Rewards</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Event-themed Field Research tasks will be available.</p>
<p>Complete Field Research tasks to earn XP, Stardust, and encounters with event-themed Pokémon.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Collection Challenges</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Complete Collection Challenges to receive XP, Stardust, and encounters with Hisuian Zorua.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Web Store</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Pokémon Storage and Item Bag upgrades are now available on the <a href="https://store.pokemongo.com/?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=ultraunlockhisui2025">Pokémon GO Web Store</a>! These upgrades are available for US$1.99 each (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency).</p>
<p>There’s a new way to log in to the Pokémon GO Web Store! Visit the web store from your mobile device and select “Sign in with Pokémon GO” to be logged in to our new and improved store.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.</p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>

originalPost.title: Zapdos descends from the thunderclouds for GO Pass: July! — Pokémon GO
originalPost.html:
GO FestAbout GO FestOsakaEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsJersey CityEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsParisEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsGlobalBuy TicketsNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode Redemption
GO FestBuy TicketsAbout GO FestOsakaJersey CityParisGlobalNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode RedemptionEnglishDeutschEspañolEspañol (México)Françaisहिन्दीBahasa IndonesiaItalianoPolskiPortuguês日本語한국어РусскийไทยTürkçe中文

15% discount for your first Pokémon GO Web Store purchase on any item $9.99 or more!
Updates
Zapdos descends from the thunderclouds for GO Pass: July!

Trainers,

GO Pass: July arrives for all Trainers worldwide!

GO Pass: July

From Tuesday, July 1, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, August 5, at 10:00 a.m. local time, the new GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe for July will be available in Pokémon GO!

GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe

A GO Pass is a free, limited-time progression track available during a specified period. By collecting GO Points you can increase your rank to earn rewards.

Trainers will automatically receive GO Pass: July on Tuesday, July 1, at 10:00 a.m. local time. You can collect GO Points and rank up to get additional rewards through Tuesday, August 5, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Additionally, from Saturday, August 2, at 12:00 a.m. to Sunday, August 3, at 11:59 p.m. local time, there’s no daily limit for how many GO Points you can earn!

For Trainers looking for upgraded rewards and faster progression, check out the GO Pass Deluxe, a paid version of the GO Pass. While progressing through the GO Pass Deluxe, you’ll be able to claim all of the rewards from both the free GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe. You can upgrade to a GO Pass Deluxe at any time and still collect rewards from previously unlocked ranks.

Rewards unlocked in the GO Pass will expire on Thursday, August 7, at 10:00 a.m. local time, so be sure to claim your rewards before they’re gone!

Pokémon GO Web Store

The GO Pass Deluxe, the paid version of the GO Pass, is also available on the Pokémon GO Web Store now! Your GO Pass Deluxe purchased via the Pokémon GO Web Store will activate as soon as the GO Pass begins.

Trainers who upgrade to GO Pass Deluxe: July or GO Pass Deluxe: July + 10 Ranks on the Pokémon GO Web Store will receive 10 Ultra Balls, five Max Revives, one Premium Battle Pass, and five Max Potions as a gift with purchase.

Featured Pokémon and Rewards

Complete Pass Tasks to rank up your GO Pass to earn the following rewards.

  • Encounter Zapdos with a Delightful Days-themed Special Background!*
  • Stardust
  • XP
  • Max Particles
  • Poké Balls
  • Candy
  • And even more goodies!

Trainers who upgrade to the GO Pass Deluxe can also earn the following rewards.

  • A Lucky Trinket
  • One Super Incubator
  • Additional encounters with even more Pokémon!
  • Premium items, such as Premium Battle Passes, Incense, a Lucky Egg, an Incubator, Lure Modules, and more!
  • Candy XL
  • And even more goodies!

*You might even encounter a Shiny one—if you’re lucky!

Major Milestone Rewards

Reach Major Milestones on your GO Pass to unlock the following bonuses.

Tier 1 – Rank 25

  • Earn 50% more XP from increasing Friendship levels.

Tier 2 – Rank 50

  • Increased XP and Stardust from Research Breakthrough rewards.

Tier 3 – Rank 75

  • Increased Stardust and XP from hatching Eggs.

Lucky Trinket

The Lucky Trinket will return as the final reward in this month’s GO Pass Deluxe.

A Lucky Trinket is a one-time-use item that can be used to turn one friend from your Friend List into a Lucky Friend. When used, the Lucky Trinket will set the status of you and your chosen friend to Lucky, even if you aren’t Best Friends yet! When you’re Lucky Friends with someone, the next time you trade with each other, both Pokémon will become Lucky Pokémon. After the trade, your Lucky Friend status will be cleared.

This exciting item will only stay in your Item Bag for a limited time, so don’t forget to use it! The Lucky Trinket earned as a part of GO Pass: July will expire on Sunday, August 10, 2025, at 11:59 p.m. local time, regardless of when you claimed it.
You must be at least Great Friends with the Trainer you wish to apply your Lucky Trinket to. You cannot use a Lucky Trinket with a Trainer you are currently Lucky Friends with. Using a Lucky Trinket on a friend does not change the distance at which you can complete a trade. If you do not want to allow other Trainers to use their Lucky Trinkets on you, you can disable this permission in your Settings page.

Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.

—The Pokémon GO team

events.subtitle: Event details parsed from post

originalPost.title: Egg-cellent rewards await with Eggs-pedition Access and Reward Road this July! — Pokémon GO
originalPost.html:
GO FestAbout GO FestOsakaEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsJersey CityEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsParisEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsGlobalBuy TicketsNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode Redemption
GO FestBuy TicketsAbout GO FestOsakaJersey CityParisGlobalNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode RedemptionEnglishDeutschEspañolEspañol (México)Françaisहिन्दीBahasa IndonesiaItalianoPolskiPortuguês日本語한국어РусскийไทยTürkçe中文

15% discount for your first Pokémon GO Web Store purchase on any item $9.99 or more!
Updates
Egg-cellent rewards await with Eggs-pedition Access and Reward Road this July!

Trainers,

There are tons of ways to earn rewards this July in Pokémon GO!

For Trainers looking to earn rewards as they explore, spin PokéStops, and send Gifts, check out this month’s Eggs-pedition Access ticket!

Eggs-pedition Access: July

Thursday, July 3, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, August 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Starting July 1, 2025, Trainers will be able to purchase Eggs-pedition Access: July for the latest Season of Pokémon GO, Delightful Days.

This ticket will help Trainers to get the most out of Delightful Days by granting bonuses such as receiving a single-use Incubator for the first PokéStop or Gym spin of the day.

Eggs-pedition Access: July Ticket

For US$4.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access bonuses and Timed Research opportunities throughout July.

Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with each Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Sunday, August 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Trainers will be able to purchase and gift tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with. Please note that purchases—including those made for other Trainers—are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.

Eggs-pedition Access: July will only be available in the in-game shop until July 10, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time.

Eggs-pedition Access: July Bonuses

Thursday, July 3, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, August 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

  • One single-use Incubator awarded for your first PokéStop or Gym spin of the day.
  • 3× XP awarded for your first catch of the day.
  • 3× XP awarded for your first PokéStop or Gym spin of the day.
  • Open up to 50 Gifts per day.
  • Receive up to 150 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStop and Gym Photo Discs.
  • Hold up to 40 Gifts in your Item Bag.

Eggs-pedition Access: July Timed Research

Thursday, July 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, August 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Complete the Timed Research tasks to receive the following rewards.

  • 15,000 XP
  • 15,000 Stardust
Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with each Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Sunday, August 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Pokémon GO Web Store – Eggs-pedition Access Ultra Ticket Box

Starting June 30, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. PDT, Trainers can purchase the Eggs-pedition Access Ultra Ticket Box via the Pokémon GO Web Store for US$9.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency) to receive Eggs-pedition Access: July and August tickets plus 100 bonus PokéCoins at no additional cost.

Please note that purchases are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.

The Eggs-pedition Access Ultra Ticket Box will be available on the web store until July 10, 2025, at 5:00 p.m. PDT.

Don’t forget, Trainers, eligible purchases like upgrading to GO Pass Deluxe or Eggs-pedition Access also earn you Reward Points to unlock rewards on this month’s Reward Road!

July Reward Road

Click here to sign in and redeem from the Reward Road section.

July 1 at 00:00 UTC to July 31, 2025, at 23:59 UTC

Let's start!

You can get more with eligible purchases this month in Pokémon GO as you shop in-game and on the Pokémon GO Web Store with the July Reward Road!*

Earn Reward Points this month to unlock rewards to help you on your adventures. You’ll even earn double Reward Points when you make your purchases on the Pokémon GO Web Store!

The July Reward Road will last until July 31, 2025, at 23:59 UTC. Reward Points and Reward Road levels will reset at that time, so be sure to claim your rewards on the Pokémon GO Web Store before the end of the month!**

Earn Reward Points this month to unlock the following rewards on the Pokémon GO Web Store to help you on your adventures.

You’ll even earn double Reward Points when you make your purchases on the Pokémon GO Web Store!

  • Level 1: 1 Razz Berry, 1 Nanab Berry
  • Level 2: 1 Premium Battle Pass
  • Level 3: 1 Incense, 1 Super Potion
  • Level 4: 1 Lucky Egg, 1 Star Piece
  • Level 5: 2 Lure Modules, 2 Hyper Potions, 5 Ultra Balls
  • Level 6: 2 Incubators, 2 Incense, 2 Stickers
  • Level 7: 4 Premium Battle Passes, 5 Max Potions
  • Level 8: 4 Incubators, 3 Silver Pinap Berries, 3 Golden Razz Berries
  • Level 9: 4 Premium Battle Passes, 4 Incubators
  • Level 10: 6 Premium Battle Passes, 6 Incubators, 1 Star Piece

The July Reward Road will last until July 31, 2025, at 23:59 UTC. Reward Points and Reward Road levels will reset at that time, so be sure to claim your rewards on the Pokémon GO Web Store before the end of the month!**

How to Earn and Claim Rewards

  • Make an eligible purchase on the Pokémon GO Web Store or in-game shop to earn Reward Points. You can earn twice as many Reward Points when you shop on the Pokémon GO Web Store!*
  • Earn Reward Points to level up the Reward Road and unlock rewards.
  • Visit the Pokémon GO Web Store to claim unlocked rewards!***

Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated on Reward Road and more.

Let's start!
*Purchases must be made with real-world currency. Purchases made using PokéCoins—and Pokémon GO Gift Card and live event ticket purchases—will not earn Reward Points.
**Reward Points expire at the end of the calendar month. Even if a Trainer claims every reward, Reward Points will not carry over between months. Trainers using child accounts are not eligible to participate in the Rewards Road program. Reward Points are not cash or any other currency, and they are non-transferable between accounts. Reward Road program availability and terms are subject to change.
***Rewards can be claimed on the Pokémon GO Web Store when a Trainer is logged in to their Pokémon GO account. An account must be in good standing to claim rewards.

Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.

—The Pokémon GO team

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            June 24, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Pokémon GO and Major League Baseball knock it out of the park with a new partnership!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Pokémon GO and Major League Baseball knock it out of the park with a new partnership!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/G75GASMO583JgZVqAi8IvcISDt1GAjbwJ_kCGyBjoIJ7TdhQLJccG1zwP3SMO9Oq0Wv9Rn065UDN9RX15ravPCp8hWqN1fg4YtDZRBpCjPGKRw=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p>Get ready to step up to the plate, Trainers–we’re excited to announce a partnership between Pokémon GO and Major League Baseball! During the 2025 season, all MLB ballparks will feature all-new, official club-branded PokéStops and Gyms so Trainers can play Pokémon GO from wherever they’re sitting in the ballpark. Trainers can also check out newly created Official Routes at the ballparks!</p>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p><br> During the season, Trainers can continue the fun by attending Pokémon GO–themed ball games! Here are a few things that might be featured during these themed games.</p>
<ul>
<li>Pokémon GO and club-branded merchandise*</li>
<li>Exclusive in-game avatar items</li>
<li>Timed Research awarding exciting Pokémon encounters</li>
<li>Raid Battles where Trainers have a chance to catch Pokémon with a Location Background</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body"><i>*Availability varies by club. Check with your local club’s website for details!</i></div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p><br> These thrilling themed games will take place during the following clubs’ <a href="https://www.mlb.com/tickets/pokemon-go">home games</a>.</p>
<ul>
<li>Seattle Mariners – Wednesday, July 2, 2025</li>
<li>Miami Marlins – Friday, July 18, 2025</li>
<li>Tampa Bay Rays – Sunday, July 20, 2025</li>
<li>Milwaukee Brewers – Friday, July 25, 2025</li>
<li>Washington Nationals – Tuesday, August 5, 2025</li>
<li>Arizona Diamondbacks – Sunday, August 10, 2025</li>
<li>Chicago White Sox – Monday, August 11, 2025</li>
<li>Baltimore Orioles – Wednesday, August 13, 2025</li>
<li>Cleveland Guardians  – Thursday, August 14, 2025</li>
<li>New York Mets – Monday, August 25, 2025</li>
<li>Boston Red Sox – Friday, August 29, 2025</li>
<li>San Francisco Giants – Friday, August 29, 2025</li>
<li>Minnesota Twins – Sunday, August 31, 2025</li>
<li>Texas Rangers – Sunday, September 7, 2025</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body"><i>Please note that dates are subject to change—stay tuned to the blog for the latest updates!</i></div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p><br> Enjoy a baseball game at your local MLB ballpark while playing Pokémon GO with your friends and family. Batter up!</p>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Gear up for the game with in-game avatar items!</span>
    </h2>
  
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Cheer on your team with exclusive in-game avatar items created in partnership with MLB! Starting Tuesday, June 24, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PDT, Trainers can score the home team’s cap for their in-game avatar by spinning a PokéStop at a ballpark where a Pokémon GO–themed baseball game is taking place. These avatar items are available for a limited time!*</p>
<p>Trainers globally can participate in the fun, too! Head to the <a href="https://store.pokemongo.com/offer-redemption?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=Blog_Promo_202506_MLB2025">Pokémon GO Web Store</a> and use the offer code <b>MLBxPOKEMONGO</b> to get an MLB-branded cap for your avatar.*</p>
<p>*Offer code and avatar items from spinning PokéStops will be available from June 24, 2025 to September 28, 2025.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p><br> Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated. </p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

            </div>

                <img alt="Twitter" src="/img/social/square/twitter.svg"/>
              </a>
            </div>

<style>.ContainerBlock{background:var(--background, transparent);color:var(--textColor, inherit);position:relative}@media(max-width: 1023px){.ContainerBlock{border-radius:10px;margin:24px 0;padding:20px 16px}}@media(min-width: 1024px){.ContainerBlock{border-radius:20px;margin:24px 0;padding:24px}}.ContainerBlock__headline{display:flex;align-items:center}.ContainerBlock__headline__icon{margin-right:12px}.ContainerBlock__headline__icon img{display:block;width:50px;line-height:40px;margin-top:0}.ContainerBlock__body a{color:var(--linkColor, inherit)}@media(max-width: 599px){.blogPost__post__blocks>.block--ContainerBlock>.ContainerBlock{margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;border-radius:0}}.CopyBlock{position:relative}.CountrySpecificBlock{position:relative}@media(max-width: 1023px){.EventBonusesBlock__bonuses{display:flex;flex-direction:column;row-gap:20px}}@media(min-width: 1024px){.EventBonusesBlock__bonuses{display:inline-grid;grid-template-columns:auto auto;-moz-column-gap:40px;column-gap:40px;row-gap:20px}}.EventBonusesBlock__bonus{display:flex;-moz-column-gap:12px;column-gap:12px;align-items:center}.EventBonusesBlock__bonus__icon{width:30px;flex-shrink:0}.EventBonusesBlock__bonus__icon img{display:block;width:100%;height:auto}.GBLScheduleBlock__schedule{max-width:520px;margin-top:40px}@media(min-width: 600px){.GBLScheduleBlock__schedule{padding-left:20px}}.GBLScheduleBlock__schedule__item{display:grid;grid-template-columns:36px 1fr;-moz-column-gap:8px;column-gap:8px;row-gap:12px}.GBLScheduleBlock__schedule__item+.GBLScheduleBlock__schedule__item{margin-top:12px}.GBLScheduleBlock__schedule__item__header{border:none;text-align:left;cursor:pointer;padding:4px 12px;border-radius:4px;background:linear-gradient(140deg, #8d67b9 0%, #c87fd0 50%, #B668c4 75%);background-size:100%       <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            June 23, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Pokémon GO Fest 2025 details revealed: Ultra Unlock, habitat times, and more!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Pokémon GO Fest 2025 details revealed: Ultra Unlock, habitat times, and more!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/Lf-JxFGBcp_hXUDOPA9o8_XxCXaRMfzxTNrYajGVymEEl7IVgbI_Clw1z-I2KMtjm60tbm2PHxR41awtWBDAen1zI5-5g8RboVzkB2dEAmVvTis=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__body">
              <p>Trainers,</p>
<p>Are you ready for the biggest Pokémon GO event of the year? Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global is almost here, and we’re excited to share some final details.</p>

            </div>
          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Saturday, June 28, and Sunday, June 29, 2025, from 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. local time each day</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Hear ye, hear ye! Get your tickets now!</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Tickets for Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global are <a href="https://store.pokemongo.com/?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=GOFestSite&utm_campaign=Web_202503_GOFest2025">here</a>!</p>
<p>The grand global revel known as Pokémon GO Fest has returned for a new year of splendid activities! Team up with Trainers near and far to discover new Pokémon and partake in the summer merriment.</p>
<p>On June 28 and 29, 2025, Trainers can gear up for a worldwide adventure during Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global. No ticket is required to participate in this global event, but Trainers can upgrade their experience with an event ticket that grants additional bonuses and Special Research that leads to an encounter with Volcanion!</p>
<p>Do make haste, and commence your arrangements before it’s too late!</p>
<p>Learn more on the <a href="pokemongolive.com/gofest">Pokémon GO Fest 2025 website</a>.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Upgrade your experience with an event ticket!</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>You can purchase an event ticket now via the in-game shop or the <a href="LINK">Pokémon GO Web Store</a>. Trainers with an event ticket will receive special bonuses and rewards—including Special Research leading to an encounter with Mythical Pokémon Volcanion!</p>
<p>Learn more about ticket holder perks <a href="https://pokemongo.com/en/gofest/global#bonuses-and-features">here</a>.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Habitat Rotations</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Event-themed Pokémon will appear in rotating habitats during both days of the event! Enjoy each habitat hour twice during event hours. Also, for the first time in Pokémon GO, you’ll be able to encounter Shiny Carbink or Shiny Frigibax in the wild—if you’re lucky!</p>
<p>Moonless Volcano: 10:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. and 2:00 p.m. to 3:00 p.m. local time</p>
<p>Galvanic Dojo: 11:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. and 3:00 p.m. to 4:00 p.m. local time</p>
<p>Hypnotic Tundra: 12:00 p.m. to 1:00 p.m. and 4:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time</p>
<p>Fae Swamp: 1:00 p.m. to 2:00 p.m. and 5:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. local time</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event-themed Pokémon</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>On Saturday, shield-themed Pokémon will appear throughout the day in addition to the rotating habitats.</p>
<p>Chansey*<br>Skarmory*<br>Larvitar*<br>Shieldon*<br>Shelmet*<br>Vullaby*<br>Oranguru*</p>
<p>Some Trainers might even encounter the following!</p>
<p>Goomy*</p>
<p>On Sunday, sword-themed Pokémon will appear throughout the day in addition to the rotating habitats.</p>
<p>Galarian Farfetch’d*<br>Cubone*<br>Ralts*<br>Karrablast*<br>Pawniard*<br>Deino*<br>Passimian*</p>
<p>Some Trainers might even encounter the following!</p>
<p>Jangmo-o*</p>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you might encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Avatar Items</span>
    </h2>
  
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following avatar items will be included in GO Pass: Ancients Recovered</p>
<ul>
<li>GO Fest 2025 Tee</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ImageBlock">
        

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/2vafrTf6-iPzRZkDpbQtZl5GY6icalr_PreqUxu-_An6AOnO7Dhcb_wc4V9fESeqxOvDknw6hKoa-c85zIeDVv-oVB2-GOKUBF4koCYMRJwX=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>


      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following pose and avatar item will be available as a part of ticket-holding Trainers’ Special Research story for the global event.</p>
<ul>
<li>GO Fest 2025 Pose</li>
<li>Volcanion T-Shirt</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--VideoBlock">
        
  <div class="VideoBlock">
    <video autoplay muted loop playsinline>
      <source src="https://storage.googleapis.com/nianticweb-axiom-cdn/pokemongo/uploads/89196922492d134e4aa70e0fe7f555a5310e9cae.mp4" />
    </video>
  </div>


      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>You can purchase the following avatar items from the in-game shop starting June 28</p>
<ul>
<li>GO Fest 2025 Pants</li>
<li>GO Fest 2025 Top (Red)</li>
<li>GO Fest 2025 Top (Blue)</li>
<li>GO Fest 2025 Top (Yellow)</li>
<li>GO Fest 2025 Hat (Red)</li>
<li>GO Fest 2025 Hat (Blue)</li>
<li>GO Fest 2025 Hat (Yellow)</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ImageBlock">
        

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/uLbWh_Y0duJzheTGulAEiPPEkwoprSNuSrucerXW9VBTp9OQFH9jxF1-oNKDhRJn4tAevbmY1RCLLGk3vx5JpQVoiZmvQ8LikXaI1R3y57bxVkk=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>


      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Stickers</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>All Trainers will be able to get Pokémon GO Fest 2025–themed stickers in the in-game shop from Friday, May 29, to Sunday, June 29, 2025! These stickers will also be available via PokéStops and Gifts during event hours from Monday, June 23, to Sunday, June 29, 2025.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ImageBlock">
        

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/tciwThfwzdEZIehZnLiDdLafT2oepPZYik4GPnhHTQKJxp0Vfea4s6YfoQ3S9afa0lA2aIEyhzVo8LAN1yGJt8eJeqe5CdQJG3OKJ0RJQxXt8w=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>


      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Hop aboard! New Costumed Pokémon at GO Fest 2025: Global</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Dapper Pikachu and Falinks in train-ing will make their global debuts in Raids during Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ImageBlock">
        

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/zC1A2O-_Kum1uktJ98OJ9If8aN78laARLN8jw9DP5EwY4s0PvpfevkjsEVKt0KN8EXvI_NQniwJJcY-_94nAJLJz08KtT6c65Rgz0wYwf6oO5g=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>


      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Special Backgrounds during Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The Zacian and Zamazenta that Trainers can catch after completing Crowned Sword Zacian and Crowned Shield Zamazenta raids might have a unique Special Background! </p>
<p>Learn more about Special Backgrounds <a href="https://pokemongo.com/post/special-backgrounds">here</a>!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--VideoBlock">
        
  <div class="VideoBlock">
    <video autoplay muted loop playsinline>
      <source src="https://storage.googleapis.com/nianticweb-axiom-cdn/pokemongo/uploads/5e886205da5562e965dbe989a49dda7cb0425aa8.mp4" />
    </video>
  </div>


      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Map out your adventure on Campfire!</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Using Campfire, you can preview event locations via an interactive event map to plan your path in advance and make the most out of your day of exploring!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/O13_METPbu5xr9iEiFMMMH6y6OMRIdVXr9MI0QzkcKEKW-AD3aKhA96yWsmFIouP5PDvTEicTSn70p3aImiqddEKDkc_ZIuOk4oI6T5O7C4k9Q=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Global Challenges & Ultra Unlocks</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>During each habitat hour on Saturday and Sunday, ticket-holding Trainers around the world can work together to complete a Global Challenge! If the challenge is completed in time, a special bonus will be unlocked for the remainder of the hour for ticket-holding Trainers.</p>
<p>Trainers can activate upgraded versions of upcoming events by completing hourly Global Challenges during GO Fest 2025: Global. A new Ultra Unlock event will activate at 15, 30, and 45 successful Global Challenges!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Ultra Unlock, Part 1: Hisui Celebration</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>If Trainers complete <strong>15</strong> hourly Global Challenges, they’ll boost Hisui Celebration, an event that will take place from Tuesday, July 8, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, July 13, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Ultra Unlock, Part 2: Steel and Scales</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>If Trainers complete a total of <strong>30</strong> Global Challenges, they’ll boost Steel and Scales, an event that will take place from Tuesday, July 22, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, July 27, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Ultra Unlock, Part 3: Origin Raid Day</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>If Trainers complete a total of <strong>45</strong> Global Challenges, they’ll boost Origin Raid Day, an event that will take place on Sunday, August 10, 2025!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p>Stay tuned for more details about these events after Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global!</p>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p>Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.</p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>

originalPost.html:

GO FestBuy TicketsAbout GO FestOsakaJersey CityParisGlobalNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode RedemptionEnglishDeutschEspañolEspañol (México)Françaisहिन्दीBahasa IndonesiaItalianoPolskiPortuguês日本語한국어РусскийไทยTürkçe中文

15% discount for your first Pokémon GO Web Store purchase on any item $9.99 or more!
Updates
July 2025 Community Day: Quaxly

July 2025 Community Day: Quaxly

Sunday, July 20, 2025, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time

Quaxly, the Duckling Pokémon, will be featured during July Community Day!

Featured Pokémon

Quaxly will appear more frequently in the wild.*

*If you’re lucky, you might encounter a Shiny one!

Featured Attack

Evolve Quaxwell (Quaxly’s Evolution) between the beginning of the event and July 27, 2025, at 10:00 p.m. local time to get a Quaquaval that knows the Charged Attack Hydro Cannon.

Hydro Cannon

  • Trainer Battles: 80 power
  • Gyms and raids: 90 power

Attack Availability Updates

Starting with the event and continuing afterwards, Quaquaval will be able to learn the Charged Attack Aqua Step.

Aqua Step

  • Trainer Battles: 55 power and increases Attack by one stage
  • Gyms and raids: 55 power

Community Day Special Research

For US$1.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access the Quaxly Community Day–exclusive Special Research. Complete this research for even more rewards including:

  • 3 encounters with Quaxly that have Delightful Days–themed Special Backgrounds
  • Additional encounters with Quaxly
  • 1 Premium Battle Pass
  • 1 Rare Candy XL

And even more goodies!

  • Stay tuned for when tickets for the Special Research go live.
  • Don’t forget: You’re now able to purchase and gift tickets to any of your friends that you’ve achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with.
  • To gift a ticket, tap the Special Research ticket in the in-game shop, then tap the Gift button instead of the Buy button.

Tickets are nonrefundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Please note that this Special Research will not include an in-game medal and will not feature a story.

*Certain restrictions apply. Gifting cannot be completed if the recipient has purchased a Special Research ticket or has been gifted one already.

Community Day Special Background Timed Research

Keep Community Day going with a Timed Research opportunity that will last for a week following the event!

Trainers that log in during July Community Day will receive Timed Research awarding an encounter with a Quaxly that has a Delightful Days–themed Special Background. You’ll even have an increased chance to encounter Shiny Quaxly when you complete these research tasks!

Don’t forget, Trainers, you can evolve Quaxwell (Quaxly’s Evolution) during the week following the event to get a Quaquaval that knows the Charged Attack Hydro Cannon!

Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Sunday, July 27, 2025, at 10:00 p.m. local time.

Event Bonuses

  • 3× Catch Stardust.
  • 2× Candy for catching Pokémon.
  • 2× chance for Trainers level 31 and up to receive Candy XL from catching Pokémon.
  • Lure Modules activated during the event will last for three hours.
  • Incense (excluding Daily Adventure Incense) activated during the event will last for three hours.
  • Take a few snapshots during Community Day for a surprise!
  • One additional Special Trade can be made for a maximum of three for the day.*
  • Trades will require 50% less Stardust.*
*While most bonuses are only active during the three-hour event period, these will be active from 2:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. local time.

Field Research

July Community Day–themed Field Research will be available! Catch Quaxly to earn rewards such as Stardust, Great Balls, additional encounters with Quaxly, and more!

If you GO out and explore with your community, you may even find Field Research that leads to encounters with Quaxly that have Delightful Days–themed Special Backgrounds—if you’re lucky!

Pokémon GO Web Store – Ultra Community Day Box

An Ultra Community Day Box featuring five Ultra Balls and one Special Research ticket will be available on the Pokémon GO Web Store during the event for US$1.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency). This web store deal will be available starting July 14 at 10:00 a.m. PDT.

Looking for other Trainers to play with?

If you’re looking for Trainers in your area to trade, battle, or join raids with on Community Day, check out our Community Day map! Here you can find Community Ambassador events and local parks.

Community Ambassadors receive support from Niantic to run Pokémon GO events for their communities. If there are no Community Ambassadors near you, you can also search Campfire and find other meetups in your area.

The parks marked on the Community Day map are historically popular places for Trainers to gather during Community Day. These parks could be a fun option to play with your local community while enjoying some fresh air.* We hope this map helps Trainers connect!

*Popular locations are provided for informational purposes only. Niantic is not hosting or operating official or unofficial events at these locations. Please be aware of your surroundings when playing Niantic games.

Community Ambassador Activations
Community Leader Activations
Popular Parks
We’re trying out new things for Community Day and will reevaluate these changes for next Season and onward.

Please be aware of your surroundings when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.

—The Pokémon GO team

events.title: Celebrate nine years with Pokémon GO’s 9th Anniversary Party!
events.subtitle: Pokémon GO’s 9th Anniversary Party
bonuses:
Increased chance to become Lucky Friends.
Increased chance to get Lucky Pokémon in trades.
PokéStops may turn gold without a Golden Lure Module.
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Pikachu wearing a cake hat and Shiny Eevee wearing a party hat from raids.
Gimmighoul holding a 9th anniversary coin will have a 9th anniversary–themed Special Background!
Friendship levels will increase faster than normal through opening Gifts, trading Pokémon, or battling together in raids, Gyms, or Trainer Battles!
Chance of finding 9 or 99 (or maybe more!) Gimmighoul Coins when you spin a PokéStop with a Golden Lure Module.
During the 9th Anniversary Party, you may discover party hats in the wild. Tapping on them will award items, or encounters with event-themed Pokémon.
Also, for the first time in Pokémon GO, you might even encounter Shiny Gimmighoul—if you’re lucky!

In addition to the above, the 9th Anniversary Party will have special bonuses on certain days!
July 1 at 10:00 a.m. – July 3 at 10:00 a.m. local time

1/2 Egg Hatch Distance when Eggs are placed in an Incubator on these days.

July 3 at 10:00 a.m. – July 5 at 10:00 a.m. local time

2× XP for catching Pokémon.

July 5 at 10:00 a.m. – July 6 at 8:00 p.m. local time

2× Stardust for catching Pokémon.
