      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            June 23, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Celebrate nine years with Pokémon GO’s 9th Anniversary Party!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Celebrate nine years with Pokémon GO’s 9th Anniversary Party!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/lh6XMCXHsjASsciRnPdavTTKL6Mz2G3JST0AyTVZn4hbKzleVEFZE2sYrEEZo8od_-5DUbLQgOjBJoCdywEm2bhDt10YQnTeLsrmMKDdArDenQ=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO’s 9th Anniversary Party</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Tuesday, July 1, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, July 6, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon Debuts</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>New costumed Pokémon will appear during this event!</p>
<p>Ivysaur wearing a party hat<br>Venusaur wearing a party hat<br>Gimmighoul holding a 9th anniversary coin*^</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">^Golden Lure Modules don’t attract Gimmighoul holding a 9th anniversary coin</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li>Increased chance to become Lucky Friends.</li>
<li>Increased chance to get Lucky Pokémon in trades.</li>
<li>PokéStops may turn gold without a Golden Lure Module.</li>
<li>Increased chance to encounter Shiny Pikachu wearing a cake hat and Shiny Eevee wearing a party hat from raids.</li>
<li>Gimmighoul holding a 9th anniversary coin will have a 9th anniversary–themed Special Background!</li>
<li>Friendship levels will increase faster than normal through opening Gifts, trading Pokémon, or battling together in raids, Gyms, or Trainer Battles!</li>
<li>Chance of finding 9 or 99 (or maybe more!) Gimmighoul Coins when you spin a PokéStop with a Golden Lure Module.</li>
<li>During the 9th Anniversary Party, you may discover party hats in the wild. Tapping on them will award items, or encounters with event-themed Pokémon.</li>
<li>Also, for the first time in Pokémon GO, you might even encounter Shiny Gimmighoul—if you’re lucky!</li>
</ul>
<p>In addition to the above, the 9th Anniversary Party will have special bonuses on certain days!</p>
<p><strong>July 1 at 10:00 a.m. – July 3 at 10:00 a.m. local time</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>1/2 Egg Hatch Distance when Eggs are placed in an Incubator on these days.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>July 3 at 10:00 a.m. – July 5 at 10:00 a.m. local time</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>2× XP for catching Pokémon.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>July 5 at 10:00 a.m. – July 6 at 8:00 p.m. local time</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>2× Stardust for catching Pokémon.</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Wild Encounters</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear more frequently in the wild. </p>
<p>Bulbasaur wearing a party hat*<br>Charmander wearing a party hat*<br>Squirtle wearing a party hat*</p>
<p>First partner Pokémon will appear on certain dates throughout the event.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Raids</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear in raids. </p>
<p><strong>One-Star Raids</strong><br>Pikachu wearing a cake hat*<br>Eevee wearing a party hat*</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Field Research Task Rewards</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Event-themed Field Research tasks will be available.</p>
<p>Complete Field Research tasks to earn items and encounters with event-themed Pokémon. This includes Gimmighoul holding a 9th anniversary coin—if you’re lucky!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Timed Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>There will be a free Timed Research opportunity available. </p>
<p>Timed Research rewards include the following.</p>
<ul>
<li>XP</li>
<li>Stardust</li>
<li>Encounters with event-themed Pokémon, including Bulbasaur wearing a party hat, Wobbuffet wearing a party hat, Gimmighoul holding a 9th anniversary coin, and more!</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Ticket</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>For <strong>US$1.99</strong> (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access event-exclusive Timed Research.</p>
<p>Timed Research rewards include the following.</p>
<ul>
<li>One Super Incubator</li>
<li>One Max Mushroom</li>
<li>An encounter with Gimmighoul holding a 9th anniversary coin</li>
<li>And more!</li>
</ul>
<p>Trainers will be able to purchase and gift tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with. Please note that purchases—including those made for other Trainers—are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Sunday, July 6, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time.</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

    </div>
  
</div>

      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Masterwork Research: Wish Granted</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>For <strong>US$4.99</strong> (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to pick up a Masterwork Research story, Wish Granted, which leads to an encounter with Shiny Jirachi!*</p>
<p>Ticket holders will gain access to the Masterwork Research story during the 9th Anniversary Party event. To receive the Masterwork Research, you must open Pokémon GO at some point during the event. After you’ve received the Masterwork Research, you can complete it at any time.</p>
<p>Trainers who purchase this Masterwork Research story or have previously received the Masterwork Research: Wish Granted (either active or completed) can also enjoy the following bonuses for the duration of our 9th Anniversary Party event.</p>
<ul>
<li>2× Incense duration</li>
<li>2× Daily Adventure Incense duration</li>
<li>2× Lucky Egg duration</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ImageBlock">
        

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/iW5QmQnD9y_f7FxVqmgx-XhlA7cpcivsvIUAFq2WhgCGR1sJ56zYsueXLvlQlzYyzfTZmZd6O_kySIEF1usPohffuFzaYoJmPuBhP91Q1jWgSg=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>


      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*Trainers who have already obtained the Masterwork Research story Wish Granted will not be able to purchase it again.</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Web Store — 9th Anniversary Party Ultra Ticket Box</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The <a href="https://store.pokemongo.com/?utm_source=PGO-game-site&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=202506_9thAnniversary">Pokémon GO Web Store</a> is celebrating this exciting milestone with the 9th Anniversary Party Ultra Ticket Box! This offer features a Timed Research ticket, exclusive early access to the Party Hat avatar item, three bonus Max Potions, three Max Revives, and one Star Piece for <strong>US$4.99</strong> (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency). Make sure to check it out!</p>
<p>Don’t forget, Trainers, you get double the Reward Points on eligible purchases when you shop with the Pokémon GO Web Store!</p>
</div>

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            June 22, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global ticket holders get early access to event-themed 2 km and 5 km Eggs!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global ticket holders get early access to event-themed 2 km and 5 km Eggs!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/CwRm63amV_vbHQkC-dzt4hbYiFoawAR4jPTEgakHLUFlux6Ot-c9ua2XeiiQBPZBA-UDKtSFcH7l5WihGPWziVWt_TabjxuSO8iPJlkk17CBkLo=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p><em>Monday, June 23, at 10:00 a.m. local time to Sunday, June 29, 2025 at 11:59 p.m. local time</em></p>
<p>Trainers,</p>
<p>If you have a ticket for Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global, get egg-cited for an early access surprise!<br>Read on for more details!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">2 km Eggs</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>For Trainers who have a Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global ticket in their inventory, the following Pokémon will hatch from 2 km Eggs from Monday, June 23, at 10:00 a.m. local time to Sunday, June 29, at 11:59 p.m. local time.</p>
<p>Karrablast*<br>Shelmet*<br>Golett*<br>Pawniard*<br>Vullaby*<br>Pancham*<br>Oranguru*<br>Passimian*</p>
<p>If you’re lucky, you might even hatch the following!</p>
<p>Blue Flower Flabébé*<br>Orange Flower Flabébé*<br>Red Flower Flabébé*<br>Yellow Flower Flabébé*</p>
<p>These early-access Eggs have an increased chance of hatching Shiny Pokémon—the same increased chance ticket-holding Trainers have of encountering Shiny Pokémon during the weekend of Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global!</p>
<p>These Pokémon will hatch from 2 km Eggs for all Trainers globally during the global GO Fest event from Saturday, June 28 at 12:00 a.m. to Sunday, June 29 at 11:59 p.m. local time, regardless of whether they have a ticket.<br>*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">5 km Eggs</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Trainers who have a Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global ticket in their inventory may find special 5 km Eggs beginning Monday, June 23, at 10:00 a.m. local time to Sunday, June 29, at 11:59 p.m. local time. These Eggs may hatch the following Pokémon!</p>
<p>These are the same Eggs that ticket-holding Trainers will get during the global GO Fest event—with the same increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon!</p>
<p>Togepi*<br>Torkoal*<br>Pachirisu*<br>Mienfoo*<br>Skiddo*<br>Carbink*<br>Goomy*<br>Klefki<br>Jangmo-o*<br>Frigibax*</p>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Web Store – GO Fest Hatcher Box</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Starting June 23, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. PDT, there will be marvelous deals available on the <a href="https://store.pokemongolive.com/?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=Blog_202505_GOFest2025Leadup">Pokémon GO Web Store</a>.</p>
<p>For US$39.99 (or equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), the GO Fest Hatcher Box will feature 25 Incubators, 30 Super Incubators, and two Poffins.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">There’s a lot more to get excited about during the lead-up to Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global!</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>This week is chock-full of fun activities to get excited about—make sure you don’t miss out. Here are some highlights.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">An adventure of ancient discovery awaits ahead of Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global!</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Get ready to set off on an adventure of discovery and unearth legendary Pokémon during the Ancients Recovered event. Complete Timed Research tasks for legendary encounters. This adventure is one you don’t want to miss! </p>
<p>Learn more about the <a href="https://pokemongolive.com/BlogPost/2025-ancients-recovered?hl=en">Ancients Recovered Event</a>.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The main event! Make sure you don’t miss out on the biggest global Pokémon GO event of the year.</p>
<p>Learn a lot more on the <a href="https://pokemongolive.com/gofest/global">GO Fest site</a>!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p>Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.</p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

            </div>

                <img alt="Twitter" src="/img/social/square/twitter.svg"/>
              </a>
            </div>

  </div>

events.title: Pokémon GO Road Trip 2025—locations, times, and other details revealed!
events.subtitle: Road Trip Schedule
bonuses:
3× Poké Balls from PokéStops and Gyms
Temporary PokéStops and Gyms around the GO Truck



3-Hour Lure Modules

50% Stardust cost for trades

Up to 5 Special Trades per day

Evolve Alolan Graveler to get an Alolan Golem that knows the Fast Attack Rollout

Temporary PokéStops and Gyms in the whole city with lure modules

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            June 18, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Pokémon GO Road Trip 2025—locations, times, and other details revealed!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Pokémon GO Road Trip 2025—locations, times, and other details revealed!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/Qubtlc3PXtHe8ub1rNDLvvmZarD-cPfDyx8qkx5lECH022G2Ic0eewkDZ2QpqBpnD12OKvI4P1b48ZTsNE8pURWXMQYrjG5AIOLW9eCAOtMfoQ=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__body">
              <p>Trainers,</p>
<p>Earlier, we announced Pokémon GO Road Trip 2025, an epic journey across Europe! Now, we’re excited to share even more details about exact locations, times, and Road Trip experiences!</p>
<p>Whether you’re visiting the GO Truck or exploring the city, special bonuses, encounters, and research tasks await you!</p>

            </div>
          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Road Trip Schedule</span>
    </h2>
  
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p><strong>Manchester, England</strong></p>
<ul>
<li><p><strong>Date:</strong> Wednesday, July 16, 2025</p>
</li>
<li><p><strong>Location:</strong> Cathedral Gardens</p>
</li>
<li><p><strong>Time:</strong> 11:00 a.m. – 7:00 p.m. (local time)</p>
</li>
</ul>

      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">In-Game</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Summer for Pokémon GO is already full of adventure with exciting global in-game events during our Road Trip, which gives Trainers plenty of chances to explore, take on raids, and level up along the way!</p>
<p>Check out the <strong><a href="https://pokemongo.com/post/cd-savethedate-s19?hl=en">blog</a></strong> for a full overview of the global in-game events happening during each Road Trip stop!</p>
<p>But we’re not stopping there! To make things even more fun, we’re expanding the gameplay experience with the following features:</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Action around the GO Truck</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Don’t miss the exclusive gameplay happening right at the GO Truck!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Wild Pokémon</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear more frequently around the GO Truck.</p>
<ul>
<li><p>Sandshrew</p>
</li>
<li><p>Alolan Geodude</p>
</li>
<li><p>Alolan Graveler</p>
</li>
<li><p>Phanpy</p>
</li>
<li><p>Venipede</p>
</li>
<li><p>Whirlipede</p>
</li>
<li><p>Golett</p>
</li>
<li><p>Wooloo</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Raids</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>One-Star Raids: Pikachu with summer flair*</p>
<p>All Trainers will have a chance of receiving a <strong>Location Background</strong> of the respective city after making a successful catch!</p>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Field Research Task Rewards</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Event-themed Field Research tasks will be available.</p>
<p>Complete Field Research tasks to earn an encounter with Pikachu with summer flair.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Timed Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>There will be free Timed Research available.</p>
<p>Timed Research rewards include the following:</p>
<ul>
<li><p>Encounter with Varoom</p>
</li>
<li><p>5 Rare Candies</p>
</li>
<li><p>2,025 XP</p>
</li>
<li><p>Poké Balls</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">On-Site Event Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li>3× Poké Balls from PokéStops and Gyms</li>
<li>Temporary PokéStops and Gyms around the GO Truck</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Citywide Gameplay</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The adventure doesn’t stop at the GO Truck—the whole city is part of the fun!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Wild Pokémon</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Trainers may find Poké Balls appearing on the map. Tapping a Poké Ball may reveal an encounter with one of these Pokémon in the wild.</p>
<ul>
<li><p>Voltorb</p>
</li>
<li><p>Electrode</p>
</li>
<li><p>Foongus</p>
</li>
<li><p>Galarian Stunfisk</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Citywide Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li><p>3-Hour Lure Modules</p>
</li>
<li><p>50% Stardust cost for trades</p>
</li>
<li><p>Up to 5 Special Trades per day</p>
</li>
<li><p>Evolve Alolan Graveler to get an Alolan Golem that knows the Fast Attack Rollout</p>
</li>
<li><p>Temporary PokéStops and Gyms in the whole city with lure modules</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Nationwide Bonus</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Even if you can’t visit the GO Truck, you can still join the adventure!</p>
<p>Seven days before the GO Truck’s arrival in each city, the following will be available nationwide in that city’s country (UK, France, Spain, Netherlands, Germany).</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Timed Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>There will be free Timed Research available.</p>
<p>Complete the Timed Research tasks to earn an encounter with Pikachu with summer flair.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Web Store</span>
    </h3>
  
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>A Pokémon GO Road Trip Storage Box will be available on the Pokémon GO Web Store for US$4.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency)! The deal will feature an Item Bag upgrade, a Pokémon Storage upgrade, one Remote Raid Pass, one Premium Battle Pass, one Super Incubator, and one Incubator.</p>
<p><br>Check it out in the <a href="https://store.pokemongo.com">Pokémon GO Web Store</a> starting July 7.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Whether you’re at the GO Truck, exploring the city, or playing across the countries, adventure is waiting! Get your Poké Balls ready, rally your friends, and join us on the road!</p>
<p>Stay tuned for more details and updates through our website and push notifications.</p>
<p>Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.</p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

            </div>

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            June 17, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global is just around the corner!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global is just around the corner!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/wSgSMVjb9apzYF0rPJOX5PjYKqrNuesL-MOxdYjRVAlUvo58QknfhTYz2KYClVWB7mL0eY3XLw3c54tq-Hh9JuozR7H_EkD4lZvNwG7-4Gm-sg=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__body">
              <p><strong>Trainers,</strong></p>
<p>The biggest Pokémon GO Fest adventure of all takes place on June 28 and 29, when millions of Trainers from around the world come together to embark on exclusive adventures. Trainers can participate in this global event at no cost from anywhere in the world! Get the most out of the event with a ticket, available now via the in-game shop or the <a href="https://store.pokemongolive.com/?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=GOFestSite&utm_campaign=Web_202503_GOFest2025&preview=true">Pokémon GO Web Store</a>. Trainers with an event ticket will receive special bonuses and rewards, including an encounter with the Mythical Pokémon Volcanion!</p>
<p>But most importantly, Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global is the best event to discover new adventures! Explore new places and connect with Community Ambassadors at meetups in a city near you.</p>
<p>Let’s get outside, make new friends, and reunite with old ones!</p>
<p>Find local meetups taking place on Saturday, June 28 and Sunday, June 29, on the <a href="https://campfire.nianticlabs.com/en/">Campfire app</a>!</p>

            </div>
          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">

events.title: Hyper Training, a new way to power up Pokémon, arrives during Ancients Recovered — Pokémon GO
events.subtitle: Event details parsed from post

originalPost.title: Hyper Training, a new way to power up Pokémon, arrives during Ancients Recovered — Pokémon GO
originalPost.html:
GO FestAbout GO FestOsakaEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsJersey CityEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsParisEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsGlobalBuy TicketsNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode Redemption
GO FestBuy TicketsAbout GO FestOsakaJersey CityParisGlobalNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode RedemptionEnglishDeutschEspañolEspañol (México)Françaisहिन्दीBahasa IndonesiaItalianoPolskiPortuguês日本語한국어РусскийไทยTürkçe中文

15% discount for your first Pokémon GO Web Store purchase on any item $9.99 or more!
Updates
Hyper Training, a new way to power up Pokémon, arrives during Ancients Recovered

Trainers,

From legendary giants to the mysterious new Gold Bottle Cap, powerful treasures are waiting to be discovered in the new, globally available GO Pass!

GO Pass: Ancients Recovered

From Monday, June 23, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, June 29, at 6:00 p.m. local time, the GO Pass and the GO Pass Deluxe for Ancients Recovered will be available in Pokémon GO!

What is a GO Pass?

A GO Pass is a free, limited-time progression track available during a specified period. By collecting GO Points, you can increase your rank to earn rewards.

Trainers worldwide will automatically receive GO Pass: Ancients Recovered at no cost on Monday, June 23, at 10:00 a.m. local time. You can collect GO Points and rank up to get additional rewards through Sunday, June 29, at 6:00 p.m. local time.

From Monday, June 23, to Friday, June 27, you can earn up to 1,000 GO Points per day outside of completing Pass Tasks. There’s no limit to the amount of GO Points you can earn on Saturday and Sunday, June 28 to 29!

For US$19.99, Trainers looking for upgraded rewards and powerful event bonuses can upgrade their free GO Pass to GO Pass Deluxe: Ancients Recovered.

While progressing through the GO Pass Deluxe, you’ll be able to claim all of the rewards from both the GO Pass Deluxe and free GO Pass. You can upgrade to a GO Pass Deluxe at any time and still collect rewards from previously unlocked ranks.

Rewards unlocked in GO Pass: Ancients Recovered will expire on Sunday, June 29, at 11:59 p.m. local time, so be sure to claim your rewards before they’re gone!

Featured Pokémon and Rewards

Complete Pass Tasks to rank up your GO Pass: Ancients Recovered to earn the following rewards.

  • Random encounter with a Regirock, Regice, Registeel, Regieleki, or Regidrago that has a Special Background!
  • Encounters with dapper Pikachu with red, blue, or yellow accents and other event-themed Pokémon!
  • Stardust
  • XP
  • Poké Balls
  • Candy
  • And even more goodies!

Trainers who upgrade to the GO Pass Deluxe can also earn the following rewards.

  • A Gold Bottle Cap, which can be used to max any Pokémon’s stats!
  • Zacian Mask avatar item
  • Zamazenta Mask avatar item
  • Premium items, such as Incense, a Lucky Egg, an Incubator, Lure Modules, and more!
  • Candy XL
  • And even more goodies!

Major Milestone Bonuses

When you upgrade to GO Pass Deluxe: Ancients Recovered, you’ll automatically unlock the following bonus.

  • 1/2 Egg Hatch Distance when Eggs are placed in an Incubator between the start of the GO Pass: Ancients Recovered period and the end of Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global.

Reach Major Milestones on your GO Pass Deluxe: Ancients Recovered to unlock the following bonuses.

Rank 10

  • One additional Raid Pass per day from spinning Gym Photo Discs.*

Rank 20

  • 2× Candy from hatching Eggs.

Rank 30

  • One additional Candy XL awarded to Trainers level 31 and up for completing 5-star and higher Raid Battles.

Rank 40

  • 2× Stardust from hatching Eggs.

Rank 50

  • Three additional Candy awarded for completing 5-star and higher Raid Battles.

Rank 60

  • 2× XP from hatching Eggs.

Rank 70

  • 5,000 additional XP from completing Raid Battles.
*During Pokémon GO Fest: Global, Trainers who have unlocked this bonus and also have a Pokémon GO Fest: Global ticket will receive up to 10 Raid Passes per day from spinning Gym Photo Discs.

Pokémon GO Web Store – GO Pass Deluxe: Ancients Recovered

The GO Pass Deluxe, the paid version of GO Pass, is also available on the Pokémon GO Web Store!

Trainers who upgrade to GO Pass Deluxe: Ancients Recovered or GO Pass Deluxe: Ancients Recovered + 10 Ranks on the Pokémon GO Web Store will receive 10 Max Revives, 10 Max Potions, five Premium Battle Passes, five Max Particle Packs, a Max Mushroom, and an Incubator as an additional gift with purchase.

Or stock up on the essentials alongside your upgrade with the web-exclusive GO Pass: Deluxe: Ancients Recovered + 10 Ranks Ultra Box which includes an upgrade to GO Pass Deluxe, enough GO Points to reach Rank 10, and 10 Max Revives, 10 Max Potions, five Premium Battle Passes, five Max Particle Packs, a Max Mushroom, five Incubators, and five Super Incubators!

Hyper Training

Reports indicate a new way to power up Pokémon has been discovered in Pokémon GO, Hyper Training!

You can kick off Hyper Training with a Gold Bottle Cap, which you can get for the first time in Pokémon GO with the deluxe GO Pass for Ancients Recovered!

What is Hyper Training?

Hyper Training is a new way for Trainers to increase a Pokémon’s HP, Attack, and Defense. By completing GO Pass Deluxe: Ancients Recovered, Trainers will be able to earn a Gold Bottle Cap. This item is used to start Hyper Training that you can complete to increase all of a Pokémon’s stats!!

Gold Bottle Caps

The Gold Bottle Cap is an exciting one-time use item that you can earn by completing GO Pass Deluxe: Ancients Recovered! You can use it to start Hyper Training with one of your Pokémon. The Pokémon just needs to be a Good Buddy or higher!*

When selecting a trainee, you will be able to choose which stats you would like to train. Gold Bottle Caps are extremely rare and obtaining one is a special occasion, so select your trainee wisely!

Gold Bottle Caps earned from GO Pass Deluxe: Ancients Recovered expire, so remember to use it! This Gold Bottle Cap will expire on Sunday, July 6, 2025, at 11:59 p.m. local time, regardless of when you claimed it.

*Shadow Pokémon and Pokémon that already have maxed out stats are not eligible for Hyper Training.

Training Tasks

Once you’ve given your chosen trainee a Gold Bottle Cap, it’s time to start Hyper Training! To train, you will complete various tasks themed to the stats you plan to raise.

  • Attack: Battle alongside your trainee while they’re your buddy.

  • Defense: Strengthen your bond with your Buddy Pokémon trainee by playing together, exploring, and catching Pokémon.

  • HP: Explore alongside your trainee as a buddy. This can include spinning PokéStops, earning Buddy Candy, or other adventures.

Once you use your Gold Bottle Cap, you’ll have 365 days to complete your Hyper Training Tasks. It’s a long and challenging course, but once you complete it your trainee will be stronger than ever!

Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.

—The Pokémon GO team

events.title: Eevee stars in July Community Day Classic, and Community Day voting returns in August!
events.subtitle: July Community Day Classic: Eevee
bonuses:
Limited-time Evolution requirement: Evolve Eevee into Espeon after exploring 1 km with Eevee as your buddy.**
Limited-time Evolution requirement: Evolve Eevee into  Umbreon after exploring 1 km with Eevee as your buddy.**
Limited-time Evolution requirement: Evolve Eevee into Sylveon after earning seven hearts with Eevee as your buddy.**
Eevee will appear more frequently in the wild. If you’re lucky, you might encounter a Shiny one!
1/4 Egg Hatch Distance
Lure Modules activated during the event will last for three hours.
Incense (excluding Daily Adventure Incense) activated during the event will last for three hours.
Take a few snapshots during the Community Day Classic event for a surprise!

**This Evolution requirement will return to the usual requirement on Saturday, July 12, 2025, at 10:00 p.m. local time.

      <pgo-promo-banner></pgo-promo-banner>
    
  



    
    
      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            June 6, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Eevee stars in July Community Day Classic, and Community Day voting returns in August!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Eevee stars in July Community Day Classic, and Community Day voting returns in August!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/jnoSaANb0-v-lf0GZqegVLDVB89cdLU7aUyg-VL6h2Sj7l6oCAlXPM_w58coKwfYWhe51DBJoOkNf1oc2MgMHt-yOCB-TJrX9Tgi8k0KPYTsHg=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Trainers,</p>
<p>We have some exciting news! Eevee, the Evolution Pokémon, will be featured for the July Community Day Classic, and Pokémon GO Community Day voting is coming back for August!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">July Community Day Classic: Eevee</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Saturday, July 5, and Sunday, July 6, 2025 from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.</p>
<p>Eevee, the Evolution Pokémon, will be featured during a two-day July Community Day Classic event!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Featured Pokémon</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Eevee will appear more frequently in the wild.*</p>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you might encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Featured Attack</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Evolve Eevee into any of its Evolutions between the beginning of the event and Saturday, July 12, at 10:00 p.m. local time, and that Pokémon will know a featured attack!</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Eevee</strong> caught or hatched during this time will know the Charged Attack Last Resort.</li>
<li><strong>Vaporeon</strong> will know the Charged Attack Scald.</li>
<li><strong>Jolteon</strong> will know the Charged Attack Zap Cannon.</li>
<li><strong>Flareon</strong> will know the Charged Attack Superpower.</li>
<li><strong>Espeon</strong> will know the Charged Attack Shadow Ball.</li>
<li><strong>Umbreon</strong> will know the Charged Attack Psychic.</li>
<li><strong>Leafeon</strong> will know the Fast Attack Bullet Seed.</li>
<li><strong>Glaceon</strong> will know the Charged Attack Water Pulse.</li>
<li><strong>Sylveon</strong> will know the Charged Attack Psyshock.</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Community Day Classic Special Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>For US$1.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access the Eevee Community Day Classic–exclusive Special Research from Saturday, July 5, at 2:00 p.m. local time to Sunday, July 6, at 5:00 p.m. local time. Complete this research for even more rewards, including one Premium Battle Pass, one Rare Candy XL, additional encounters with Eevee and its Evolutions, and three encounters with Eevee that have a Delightful Days Special Background.</p>
<ul>
<li>Stay tuned for when tickets for the Special Research go live!</li>
<li>Don’t forget: you can now purchase and gift tickets to any of your friends that you’ve achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with.* To gift a ticket, tap the Special Research ticket in the in-game shop, then tap the Gift button instead of the Buy button.</li>
</ul>
<p>Tickets are nonrefundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Please note that this Special Research will not include an in-game medal and will not feature a story.</p>
<p>*Certain restrictions apply. Gifting cannot be completed if the recipient has purchased a Special Research ticket or has been gifted one already.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Community Day Special Background Timed Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Keep the Community Day fun going with a Timed Research opportunity that will last for a week following the event!</p>
<p>Trainers that log in during July Community Day Classic (Saturday, July 5, and Sunday, July 6, 2025, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time on both days) will receive Timed Research that awards an encounter with an Eevee that has a Delightful Days–themed Special Background. You’ll even have an increased chance to encounter Shiny Eevee when you complete these research tasks!</p>
<p>Don’t forget, Trainers, during the week following the event, you can evolve Eevee into any of its Evolutions, and that Pokémon will know a special attack!!</p>
<p><i>Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Saturday, July 12, 2025, at 10:00 p.m. local time.</i></p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li>Limited-time Evolution requirement: Evolve Eevee into Espeon after exploring 1 km with Eevee as your buddy.**</li>
<li>Limited-time Evolution requirement: Evolve Eevee into  Umbreon after exploring 1 km with Eevee as your buddy.**</li>
<li>Limited-time Evolution requirement: Evolve Eevee into Sylveon after earning seven hearts with Eevee as your buddy.**</li>
<li>Eevee will appear more frequently in the wild. If you’re lucky, you might encounter a Shiny one!</li>
<li>1/4 Egg Hatch Distance</li>
<li>Lure Modules activated during the event will last for three hours.</li>
<li>Incense (excluding Daily Adventure Incense) activated during the event will last for three hours.</li>
<li>Take a few snapshots during the Community Day Classic event for a surprise!</li>
</ul>
<p>**This Evolution requirement will return to the usual requirement on Saturday, July 12, 2025, at 10:00 p.m. local time.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Field Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>July Community Day Classic–themed Field Research will be available! Catch Eevee to earn rewards such as Stardust, Great Balls, additional encounters with Eevee, and more!</p>
<p>If you GO out and explore with your community, you may even find Field Research that leads to encounters with Eevee that have Delightful Days–themed Special Backgrounds—if you’re lucky!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">PokéStop Showcases</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Be on the lookout for Showcases at different PokéStops during Eevee Community Day Classic!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Web Store – Ultra Community Day Box</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>An Ultra Community Day Box featuring two Silver Pinap Berries and one Special Research ticket will be available on the <a href="https://store.pokemongo.com/?utm_source=PGO-game-site&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=julycommunitydayclassic2025">Pokémon GO Web Store</a> during the event for US$1.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency). This web store deal will be available starting July 1 at 10:00 a.m. PDT.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Looking for other Trainers to play with?</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>If you’re looking for Trainers in your area to trade, battle, or join raids with on Community Day, check out our <a href="https://pokemongolive.com/community-day/map/?hl=en">Community Day map</a>! Here you can find Community Ambassador events and local parks.</p>
<p>Community Ambassadors receive support from Niantic to run Pokémon GO events for their communities. If there are no Community Ambassadors near you, you can also search <a href="https://campfire.nianticlabs.com/en/">Campfire</a> and find other meetups in your area.</p>
<p>The parks marked on the Community Day map are historically popular places for Trainers to gather during Community Day. They could be a fun option to play with your local community while enjoying some fresh air.* We hope this map helps Trainers connect!</p>
<p>*Popular locations are provided for informational purposes only. Niantic is not hosting or operating official or unofficial events at these locations. Please be aware of your surroundings when playing Niantic games.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CommunityDayMapBlock">

      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Community Day voting is back for August Community Day!</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>We’re bringing back a delightful treat for the final Community Day of the Season with the return of Community Day voting! From Saturday, June 7, at 6:00 p.m. PDT to Sunday, June 8, at 6:00 p.m. PDT, you’ll be able to vote for the August Community Day featured Pokémon via our <a href="https://www.youtube.com/pokemongo">official Pokémon GO YouTube channel</a>. The Pokémon that receives the most votes will be featured on August Community Day on August 30, 2025, at 2:00 p.m. local time.<br><br></p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">August Community Day Candidates</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Your Community Day candidates are <strong>Frillish</strong>, <strong>Wimpod</strong>, <strong>Rookidee</strong>, and <strong>Lechonk</strong>! Here are the attacks that will be featured for each Pokémon if they win.</p>
<ul>
<li><p><strong>Frillish:</strong> Evolve Frillish to get a Jellicent that knows the Charged Attack Poltergeist.</p>
</li>
<li><p><strong>Wimpod:</strong> Evolve Wimpod to get a Golisopod that knows the Charged Attack Rock Slide.</p>
</li>
<li><p><strong>Rookidee:</strong> Evolve Corvisquire (Rookidee’s Evolution) to get a Corviknight that knows the Charged Attack Air Cutter.</p>
</li>
<li><p><strong>Lechonk:</strong> Evolve Lechonk to get an Oinkologne that knows the Charged Attack Disarming Voice.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>The winner will be announced shortly after voting closes, and event bonuses and more event details will be announced later. Stay tuned, Trainers!<br><br></p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ImageBlock">
        

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/A-69zCB5jRltHzzFfwCAp55dmrDiMF64FzFb5OSLScL8HXcQ5OgBhrk97nFGoKsMr1wpPaDGuM9vfcaT03GksNg9dkbuTzIO8Jh-r6yCzcxSlBA=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>


      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #FFFFFF" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">How To Vote</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>We will host a poll on <a href="https://www.youtube.com/@pokemongo/community">our official Pokémon GO YouTube channel</a> on <strong>Saturday, June 7, at 6:00 p.m. PDT until Sunday, June 8, at 6:00 p.m. PDT</strong>.</p>
<p>You will have 24 hours to cast your vote for the Pokémon you’d like to see most for August Community Day 2025. Each Trainer gets one vote!</p>
<p>The winners will be announced shortly after voting ends. The Pokémon that receives the most votes by the end of the voting period will be the featured Pokémon for August Community Day.</p>
<p>Make your voices heard as we celebrate these Delightful Days in Pokémon GO! Be sure to campaign for your favorite Pokémon using #PokemonGOCommunityDay.</p>
<p>Let’s GO!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Please be aware of your surroundings when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.</p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

            </div>

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            June 5, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Yamper makes its paw-some debut during Yamper’s Paw Prints!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Yamper makes its paw-some debut during Yamper’s Paw Prints!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/p2a2E8BCXzLmDQaTE8CBCdO1M3CH8XUftuolECvfhVr2Nug1hXnSwfC5rJcnpm_LHc7_RduUENnaeJT_7zfJNgRAwl0lj3eqEBygRVkq-Wl7=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Yamper’s Paw Prints</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Friday, June 20, at 12:00 a.m. to Sunday, June 22, 2025, at 11:59 p.m. local time</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon Debuts</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon first discovered in the Galar region will make their Pokémon GO debuts!</p>
<p>Yamper<br>Boltund</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">You can use 50 Yamper Candy to evolve Yamper into Boltund.</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li>2× Stardust for catching Pokémon.</li>
<li>Increased chance to encounter Shiny Snubbull, Shiny Poochyena, and Shiny Furfrou.</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Wild Encounters</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear more frequently in the wild.</p>
<p>Growlithe*<br>Snubbull*<br>Houndour*<br>Poochyena*<br>Electrike*<br>Lillipup*<br>Furfrou*<br>Fidough</p>
<p>Some Trainers might even encounter the following!</p>
<p>Hisuian Growlithe*<br>Yamper</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Field Research Task Rewards</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Event-themed Field Research tasks will be available.</p>
<p>Complete Field Research tasks to earn encounters with event-themed Pokémon.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Timed Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Timed Research will also be available each day of the event. This Timed Research will give Trainers tasks focused on exploration and catching Pokémon.</p>
<p>June 20</p>
<ul>
<li>Encounters with the featured Pokémon of the day: Poochyena*</li>
<li>3,000 XP</li>
<li>1,500 Stardust</li>
</ul>
<p>June 21</p>
<ul>
<li>Encounters with the featured Pokémon of the day: Furfrou*</li>
<li>3,000 XP</li>
<li>1,500 Stardust</li>
</ul>
<p>June 22</p>
<ul>
<li>Encounters with the featured Pokémon of the day: Snubbull*</li>
<li>3,000 XP</li>
<li>1,500 Stardust</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before 11:59 p.m. local time each day of the event.</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Paid Timed Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>For US$0.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access event-exclusive Timed Research.</p>
<p>Complete the event-themed research tasks, such as spinning PokéStops or evolving Pokémon, to receive the following.</p>
<ul>
<li>4 Incense</li>
<li>6,000 Stardust</li>
<li>Encounters with event-themed Pokémon, including Snubbull, Poochyena, Rockruff, Yamper, and more!</li>
</ul>
<p>Trainers will be able to purchase and gift tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with. Please note that purchases—including those made for other Trainers—are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--IconFootnotesBlock">
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock">
  
    <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote">
      
      
        <div class="IconFootnotesBlock__footnote__body">The tasks associated with the paid Timed Research will be available starting Friday, June 20, at 12:00 a.m. local time. To get the rewards, the tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Sunday, June 22, 2025, at 11:59 p.m. local time.</div>
      
    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Web Store</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>It’s easier than ever to log in to the <a href="https://store.pokemongo.com/?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=Blog_202505_Yamper">Pokémon GO Web Store</a>! Visit the web store from your mobile device and select the “Sign in with Pokémon GO” option to be automatically logged in to our new and improved store.</p>
<p>Don’t forget, Trainers, you get double the Reward Points on eligible purchases when you shop with the Pokémon GO Web Store!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated. </p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

events.title: Articuno, the Lucky Trinket, and more return for GO Pass: June! — Pokémon GO
events.subtitle: Event details parsed from post

originalPost.title: Articuno, the Lucky Trinket, and more return for GO Pass: June! — Pokémon GO
originalPost.html:
GO FestAbout GO FestOsakaEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsJersey CityEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsParisEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsGlobalBuy TicketsNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode Redemption
GO FestBuy TicketsAbout GO FestOsakaJersey CityParisGlobalNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode RedemptionEnglishDeutschEspañolEspañol (México)Françaisहिन्दीBahasa IndonesiaItalianoPolskiPortuguês日本語한국어РусскийไทยTürkçe中文

15% discount for your first Pokémon GO Web Store purchase on any item $9.99 or more!
Updates
Articuno, the Lucky Trinket, and more return for GO Pass: June!

Trainers,

Beginning with GO Pass: June, Trainers worldwide will be able to check out the monthly GO Pass!

GO Pass: June

From Tuesday, June 3, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, July 1, at 10:00 a.m. local time, the new GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe for June will be available in Pokémon GO!

GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe

The GO Pass is a free, limited-time progression track available during a specified period. By collecting GO Points you can increase your rank to earn rewards. The GO Pass feature is currently being tested.

Trainers will automatically receive GO Pass: June on Tuesday, June 3, at 10:00 a.m. local time. You can collect GO Points and rank up to get additional rewards through Tuesday, July 1, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Additionally, from Saturday, June 28, at 12:00 a.m. to Sunday, June 29, at 11:59 p.m. local time, there’s no daily limit for how many GO Points you can earn!

For Trainers looking for upgraded rewards and faster progression, check out the GO Pass Deluxe, a paid version of the GO Pass. While progressing through the GO Pass Deluxe, you’ll be able to claim all of the rewards from both the free GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe. You can upgrade to a GO Pass Deluxe at any time and still collect rewards from previously unlocked ranks.

Rewards unlocked in the GO Pass will expire on Thursday, July 3, at 10:00 a.m. local time, so be sure to claim your rewards before they’re gone!

Pokémon GO Web Store

The GO Pass Deluxe, the paid version of the GO Pass, is also available on the Pokémon GO Web Store now! Your GO Pass Deluxe purchased via the Pokémon GO Web Store will activate as soon as the GO Pass begins.

Trainers who upgrade to GO Pass Deluxe: June or GO Pass Deluxe: June + 10 Ranks on the Pokémon GO Web Store will receive 10 Ultra Balls, five Max Revives, one Premium Battle Pass, and five Max Potions as a gift with purchase.

Featured Pokémon and Rewards

Complete Pass Tasks to rank up your GO Pass to earn the following rewards.

  • Encounter Articuno with a Delightful Days-themed Special Background!*
  • Stardust
  • XP
  • Max Particles
  • Poké Balls
  • Candy
  • And even more goodies!

Trainers who upgrade to the GO Pass Deluxe can also earn the following rewards.

  • A Lucky Trinket
  • One Super Incubator
  • Additional encounters with even more Pokémon!
  • Premium items, such as Premium Battle Passes, Incense, a Lucky Egg, an Incubator, Lure Modules, and more!
  • Candy XL
  • And even more goodies!

*You might even encounter a Shiny one—if you’re lucky!

Major Milestone Rewards

Reach Major Milestones on your GO Pass to unlock the following bonuses.

Tier 1 – Rank 25

  • Earn 50% more XP from increasing Friendship level.

Tier 2 – Rank 50

  • Increased XP and Stardust from Research Breakthrough rewards.

Tier 3 – Rank 75

  • Increased Stardust and XP from hatching Eggs.

Lucky Trinket

The Lucky Trinket will return as the final reward in this month’s GO Pass Deluxe.

A Lucky Trinket is a one-time-use item that can be used to turn one friend from your Friend List into a Lucky Friend. When used, the Lucky Trinket will set the status of you and your chosen friend to Lucky, even if you aren’t Best Friends yet! When you’re Lucky Friends with someone, the next time you trade with each other, both Pokémon will become Lucky Pokémon. After the trade, your Lucky Friend status will be cleared.

This exciting item will only stay in your Item Bag for a limited time, so don’t forget to use it! The Lucky Trinket earned as a part of GO Pass: June will expire on Sunday, July 6, 2025, at 11:59 p.m. local time, regardless of when you claimed it.

You must be at least Great Friends with the Trainer you wish to apply your Lucky Trinket to. You cannot use a Lucky Trinket with a Trainer you are currently Lucky Friends with. Using a Lucky Trinket on a friend does not change the distance at which you can complete a trade. If you do not want to allow other Trainers to use their Lucky Trinkets on you, you can disable this permission in your Settings page.

Differences in GO Pass Experiences

We continually strive to improve the Pokémon GO experience. Before we fully launch the monthly version of GO Pass, we want to ensure it has a positive impact on the Trainer experience.
Because of this, some Trainers with a GO Pass may see the following differences between passes.

  • Pokémon encounter visibility on the GO Pass and GO Pass Deluxe
  • Different XP rewards

We appreciate the support of Trainers worldwide as we test this new feature.

Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.

—The Pokémon GO team
