originalPost.title: Egg-citing rewards await with Eggs-pedition Access and Reward Road this June! — Pokémon GO
originalPost.html:
GO FestAbout GO FestOsakaEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsJersey CityEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsParisEvent GameplayIn-Person ExperiencesPlan Your TripTicketsGlobalBuy TicketsNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode Redemption
GO FestBuy TicketsAbout GO FestOsakaJersey CityParisGlobalNewsSeasonsEVENTSCommunityLEADERBOARDShopWeb StoreEvent TicketingCode RedemptionEnglishDeutschEspañolEspañol (México)Françaisहिन्दीBahasa IndonesiaItalianoPolskiPortuguês日本語한국어РусскийไทยTürkçe中文

15% discount for your first Pokémon GO Web Store purchase on any item $9.99 or more!
Updates
Egg-citing rewards await with Eggs-pedition Access and Reward Road this June!

Trainers,

There’s tons of ways to earn rewards this June in Pokémon GO!

For Trainers looking to earn rewards as they explore, spin PokéStops, and give Gifts, check out this month’s Eggs-pedition Access ticket!

Eggs-pedition Access: June

Tuesday, June 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. to Thursday, July 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Starting June 3, 2025, Trainers will be able to purchase Eggs-pedition Access: June for the latest Season of Pokémon GO, Delightful Days.

This ticket will help Trainers to get the most out of Delightful Days by granting bonuses such as receiving a single-use Incubator for the first PokéStop or Gym spin of the day.

Eggs-pedition Access: June Ticket

For US$4.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access bonuses and Timed Research opportunities throughout June.

Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with each Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Thursday, July 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Trainers will be able to purchase and gift tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with. Please note that purchases—including those made for other Trainers—are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.

Eggs-pedition Access: June will only be available in the in-game shop until June 10, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time.

Eggs-pedition Access: June Bonuses

The following bonuses will be available every day from when the ticket is purchased to Thursday, July 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

  • One single-use Incubator awarded for your first PokéStop or Gym spin of the day.
  • 3× XP awarded for your first catch of the day.
  • 3× XP awarded for your first PokéStop or Gym spin of the day.
  • Open up to 50 Gifts per day.
  • Receive up to 150 Gifts per day from spinning PokéStop and Gym Photo Discs.
  • Hold up to 40 Gifts in your Item Bag.

Eggs-pedition Access: June Timed Research

Tuesday, June 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. to Thursday, July 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Complete the Timed Research tasks to receive the following rewards.

  • 15,000 XP
  • 15,000 Stardust

Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with each Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Thursday, July 3, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. local time.

Pokémon GO Web Store – Eggs-pedition Access Ultra Ticket Box

Starting May 30, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. PDT, Trainers can purchase the Eggs-pedition Access Ultra Ticket Box via the Pokémon GO Web Store for US$14.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency) to receive Eggs-pedition Access: June, July, and August tickets plus 100 bonus PokéCoins at no additional cost.

Please note that purchases are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.

The Eggs-pedition Access Ultra Ticket Box will be available on the web store until June 10, 2025, at 5:00 p.m. PDT.

Don’t forget, Trainers, eligible purchases like Eggs-pedition Access: June also earn you Reward Points to unlock rewards on this month’s Reward Road!

June Reward Road

June 1 at 00:00 UTC to June 30, 2025, at 23:59 UTC

Click here to sign in and redeem from the Reward Road section.

LET'S START

You can get more with eligible purchases this month in Pokémon GO as you shop in-game and on the Pokémon GO Web Store with the June Reward Road!*

Earn Reward Points this month to unlock the following rewards on the Pokémon GO Web Store to help you on your adventures.

You’ll even earn double Reward Points when you make your purchases on the Pokémon GO Web Store!

  • Level 1: 3 Stickers
  • Level 2: 1 Premium Battle Pass
  • Level 3: 1 Incense, 2 Stickers
  • Level 4: 1 Lucky Egg, 1 Star Piece
  • Level 5: 2 Lure Modules, 8 Stickers
  • Level 6: 2 Incubators, 2 Incense, 2 Stickers
  • Level 7: 4 Premium Battle Passes, 3 Max Revives, 3 Max Potions
  • Level 8: 4 Incubators, 3 Silver Pinap Berries, 3 Golden Razz Berries
  • Level 9: 4 Premium Battle Passes, 4 Incubators
  • Level 10: 6 Premium Battle Passes, 6 Incubators, 6 Stickers

The June Reward Road will last until June 30, 2025, at 23:59 UTC. Reward Points and Reward Road levels will reset at that time, so be sure to claim your rewards on the Pokémon GO Web Store before the end of the month!**

How to Earn and Claim Rewards

  • Make an eligible purchase on the Pokémon GO Web Store or in-game shop to earn Reward Points. You can earn twice as many Reward Points when you shop on the Pokémon GO Web Store!*

  • Earn Reward Points to level up the Reward Road and unlock rewards.

  • Visit the Pokémon GO Web Store to claim unlocked rewards!***

Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated on Reward Road and more.

*Purchases must be made with real-world currency. Purchases made using PokéCoins—and Pokémon GO Gift Card and live event ticket purchases—will not earn Reward Points.
**Reward Points expire at the end of the calendar month. Even if a Trainer claims every reward, Reward Points will not carry over between months. Trainers using child accounts are not eligible to participate in the Rewards Road program. Reward Points are not cash or any other currency, and they are non-transferable between accounts. Reward Road program availability and terms are subject to change.
***Rewards can be claimed on the Pokémon GO Web Store when a Trainer is logged in to their Pokémon GO account. An account must be in good standing to claim rewards.

Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.

—The Pokémon GO team

events.title: June 2025 Community Day: Jangmo-o
events.subtitle: June 2025 Community Day: Jangmo-o
bonuses:
3× XP for catching Pokemon.
2× Candy for catching Pokémon.
2× chance for Trainers level 31 and up to receive Candy XL from catching Pokémon.
Lure Modules activated during the event will last for three hours.
Incense (excluding Daily Adventure Incense) activated during the event will last for three hours.
Take a few snapshots during Community Day for a surprise!
One additional Special Trade can be made for a maximum of three for the day.*
Trades will require 50% less Stardust.*

*While most bonuses are only active during the three-hour event period, these will be active from 2:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. local time.

  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            May 28, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">June 2025 Community Day: Jangmo-o</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="June 2025 Community Day: Jangmo-o" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/vOI7qV5u7nD8sjzFANXSD1LxpXOSaHe7UiciXnhd41ROqPQICe33wR9wQpOOXpar8Zl0HOQytIvBbknuEOYBzlkmWUAcz9ppl4leKNOlt8d-=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">June 2025 Community Day: Jangmo-o</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Saturday, June 21, 2025, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time</p>
<p>Jangmo-o, the Scaly Pokémon, will be featured during June Community Day!</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Featured Pokémon</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Jangmo-o will appear more frequently in the wild.*</p>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you might encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Featured Attack</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Evolve Hakamo-o (Jangmo-o’s Evolution) between the beginning of the event and June 28, 2025, at 10:00 p.m. local time to get a Kommo-o that knows the Charged Attack Clanging Scales.</p>
<p>Clanging Scales</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Trainer Battles</strong>: 120 power and decreases Defense by one stage</li>
<li><strong>Gyms and raids</strong>: 120 power</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Community Day Special Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>For US$1.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access the Jangmo-o Community Day–exclusive Special Research. Complete this research for even more rewards, including the following.</p>
<ul>
<li><p>3 encounters with Jangmo-o that have Delightful Days–themed Special Backgrounds</p>
</li>
<li><p>Additional encounters with Jangmo-o</p>
</li>
<li><p>1 Premium Battle Pass</p>
</li>
<li><p>1 Rare Candy XL<br>And even more goodies!</p>
<br>
</li>
<li><p>Stay tuned for when tickets for the Special Research go live.</p>
</li>
<li><p>Don’t forget: You’re now able to purchase and gift tickets to any of your friends that you’ve achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with.</p>
</li>
<li><p>To gift a ticket, tap the Special Research ticket in the in-game shop, then tap the Gift button instead of the Buy button.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>Tickets are nonrefundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Please note that this Special Research will not include an in-game medal and will not feature a story.</p>
<p>*Certain restrictions apply. Gifting cannot be completed if the recipient has purchased a Special Research ticket or has been gifted one already.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Community Day Special Background Timed Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Keep Community Day going with a Timed Research opportunity that will last for a week following the event!</p>
<p>Trainers that log in during June Community Day will receive Timed Research awarding an encounter with a Jangmo-o that has a Delightful Days–themed Special Background. You’ll even have an increased chance to encounter Shiny Jangmo-o when you complete these research tasks!</p>
<p>Don’t forget, Trainers, you can evolve Hakamo-o (Jangmo-o’s Evolution) during the week following the event to get a Kommo-o that knows the Charged Attack Clanging Scales!</p>
<p>Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Saturday, June 28, 2025, at 10:00 p.m. local time.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li>3× XP for catching Pokemon.</li>
<li>2× Candy for catching Pokémon.</li>
<li>2× chance for Trainers level 31 and up to receive Candy XL from catching Pokémon.</li>
<li>Lure Modules activated during the event will last for three hours.</li>
<li>Incense (excluding Daily Adventure Incense) activated during the event will last for three hours.</li>
<li>Take a few snapshots during Community Day for a surprise!</li>
<li>One additional Special Trade can be made for a maximum of three for the day.*</li>
<li>Trades will require 50% less Stardust.*</li>
</ul>
<p>*While most bonuses are only active during the three-hour event period, these will be active from 2:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. local time.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Field Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>June Community Day–themed Field Research will be available! Catch Jangmo-o to earn rewards such as Stardust, Great Balls, additional encounters with Jangmo-o, and more!</p>
<p>If you GO out and explore with your community, you may even find Field Research that leads to encounters with Jangmo-o that have Delightful Days–themed Special Backgrounds—if you’re lucky!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">PokéStop Showcases</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Be on the lookout for Showcases at different PokéStops during Jangmo-o Community Day!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Web Store – Ultra Community Day Box</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>An Ultra Community Day Box featuring two Rare Candies and one Special Research ticket will be available on the <a href="https://store.pokemongolive.com/?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=Blog_2025_UltraCDJune2025">Pokémon GO Web Store</a> during the event for US$1.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency).</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Looking for other Trainers to play with?</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>If you’re looking for Trainers in your area to trade, battle, or join raids with on Community Day, check out our <a href="https://pokemongolive.com/community-day/map/?hl=en">Community Day map</a>! Here you can find Community Ambassador events and local parks.</p>
<p>Community Ambassadors receive support from Niantic to run Pokémon GO events for their communities. If there are no Community Ambassadors near you, you can also search <a href="https://campfire.nianticlabs.com/en/">Campfire</a> and find other meetups in your area.</p>
<p>The parks marked on the Community Day map are historically popular places for Trainers to gather during Community Day. These parks could be a fun option to play with your local community while enjoying some fresh air.* We hope this map helps Trainers connect!</p>
<p>*Popular locations are provided for informational purposes only. Niantic is not hosting or operating official or unofficial events at these locations. Please be aware of your surroundings when playing Niantic games.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">

events.title: GO Battle League: Delightful Days Update
events.subtitle: GO Battle League: Delightful Days
bonuses:
4× Stardust from win rewards. (This does not include end-of-set rewards.)
The maximum number of sets you can play per day will increase from five to 20—for a total of 100 battles—from 12:00 a.m. to 11:59 p.m. local time.
Free battle-themed Timed Research will be available. Rewards include shoes for your avatar inspired by a powerful Battle Tower battler.
Pokémon encountered via GO Battle League rewards will have a wider variance of Attack, Defense, and HP.

   style="--background: #003e65;--textColor: #FFF" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">GO Battle League: Delightful Days</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>GO Battle League: Delightful Days will start on Tuesday, June 3, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PDT (GMT −7).</p>
<p>The following will occur at the beginning of the Season.</p>
<ul>
<li>End-of-Season rewards will be available on the Battle screen.</li>
<li>Your GO Battle League rank will be reset.</li>
<li>Rank-up requirements will remain the same as the prior Season.</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>

      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">

  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);--textColor: #FFF" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">GO Battle League Timed Research Pass</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>For our most dedicated battlers, a pass to access battle-themed Timed Research will be available in the in-game shop at no cost once GO Battle League: Delightful Days begins.</p>
<p>This Timed Research will keep track of your victories throughout the Season. Each research page will require 100 wins to complete, and doing so will award Stardust and items such as Rare Candy XL, an Elite Fast TM (at 400 wins), and an Elite Charged TM (at 500 wins). Keep at it throughout the Season to see how far you can get!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">

  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);--textColor: #FFF" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Avatar Items and Other Rewards</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Trainers will be able to earn the following avatar items, which are all inspired by a powerful Battle Tower battler from the Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield video games!</p>
<ul>
<li>At Ace rank, you’ll receive the Battle Tower Leon–Style Boots.</li>
<li>At Veteran rank, you’ll receive the Battle Tower Leon–Style Pants.</li>
<li>At Expert rank, you’ll receive the Battle Tower Leon–Style Top.</li>
<li>At Legend rank, you’ll receive the Battle Tower Leon–Style Pose.</li>
</ul>
</div>

events.title: An ancient discovery awaits! The legendary giants return ahead of Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global.
events.subtitle: Ancients Recovered
bonuses:
Remote Raid Pass limit increased to 30 from Monday, June 23, to Thursday, June 26, 2025.
No Remote Raid limit from Friday, June 27, to Sunday, June 29, 2025.
Trainers level 31 and up are guaranteed to receive Candy XL for trading Pokémon from June 23 at 10:00 a.m. local time to June 29 at 11:59 p.m. local time.
Trainers can receive special event stickers from PokéStops and Gifts.

      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Raids</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Pokémon appearing in five-star raids each day will also be featured in a Raid Hour from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time on that day.</p>
<p>The following Pokémon will appear in raids.</p>
<p><strong>Five-Star Raids: Monday, June 23</strong><br>Regirock*<br>Regice*<br>Registeel*</p>
<p><strong>Five-Star Raids: Tuesday, June 24</strong><br>Regieleki*</p>
<p><strong>Five-Star Raids: Wednesday, June 25</strong><br>Regidrago*</p>
<p><strong>Five-Star Raids: Thursday, June 26</strong><br>Regigigas*</p>
<p><strong>Five-Star Raids: Friday, June 27</strong><br>Regirock*<br>Regice*<br>Registeel*<br>Regigigas*<br>Regieleki*<br>Regidrago*</p>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Featured Attacks</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>When you catch the following Pokémon during the event, they will know the following attacks.</p>
<p>Regirock will know the Charged Attack Earthquake.</p>
<p>Regice will know the Charged Attack Thunder.</p>
<p>Registeel will know the Charged Attack Zap Cannon.</p>
<p>Regieleki will know the Charged Attack Thunder Cage.</p>
<p>Regidrago will know the Fast Attack Dragon Breath.</p>
<p>Regidrago will know the Charged Attack Dragon Energy.</p>
<p>Regigigas will know the Charged Attack Crush Grip.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Max Battle</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear in six-star Max Battles.</p>
<p>Gigantamax Rillaboom<br>Gigantamax Cinderace<br>Gigantamax Inteleon</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Ancients Recovered Timed Research: Legendary Giants</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Legendary giants raid–themed Timed Research will be available throughout the event!</p>
<p>Complete the research tasks to earn encounters with the following event-themed Pokémon.</p>
<p>Regirock*<br>Regice*<br>Registeel*<br>Regigigas*<br>Regieleki*<br>Regidrago*</p>
<p>Trainers who complete this Timed Research will get to make a surprise choice, and they’ll have the opportunity to repeat the research multiple times.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Ancients Recovered Timed Research: Fleeting Legends Ticket</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The ticket will be available for purchase from June 23 at 10:00 a.m. to June 29 at 6:00 p.m. local time.</p>
<p>For US$7.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll receive event-exclusive Timed Research leading to an encounter with your choice of Galarian Articuno, Galarian Zapdos, or Galarian Moltres.</p>
<p>Trainers will be able to purchase and gift tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher. Please note that purchases—including those made for other Trainers—are non-refundable (subject to applicable law and the exceptions set forth in the Terms of Service). Tickets cannot be purchased with PokéCoins.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Pokémon GO Web Store – Fleeting Legends Ultra Ticket Box</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The Fleeting Legends Ultra Ticket Box will be available on the <a href="https://store.pokemongolive.com/?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=Blog_202505_GOFest2025Leadup">Pokémon GO Web Store</a> for US$7.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency). This includes an event Timed Research ticket, a bonus Premium Battle Pass, one Max Particle Pack, and five Ultra Balls!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">New Pokémon Backgrounds Debut!</span>
    </h2>
  
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ImageBlock">
        

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/bXn0NRa8yLgsiTvh_T5uMs9wCj4JBj_hp6V-vYexAUkpA-qYxCSNNnLeGypFVzYMtbY0pdJ6kGFKlao-C42wfg4sPGbU0stAhg8TAsgZG0tw=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>


      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p>After catching certain Pokémon from Raid Battles, Trainers will have a chance to receive Special Backgrounds! These souvenir backgrounds will appear on a Pokémon’s summary page, similar to the Location Backgrounds that are available exclusively at in-person events.</p>
<p>Learn more about Special Backgrounds <a href="https://pokemongolive.com/post/special-backgrounds">here</a>!</p>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--VideoBlock">
        
  <div class="VideoBlock">
    <video autoplay muted loop playsinline>
      <source src="https://storage.googleapis.com/nianticweb-axiom-cdn/pokemongo/uploads/5e1469ffcdf0d79c51da31f23bbf238b6c8b969f.mp4" />
    </video>
  </div>


      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Global Challenge</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Trainers around the world will be able to work together to complete a Global Challenge during the event! If the challenge is completed in time, all Trainers will benefit from the following bonuses until the end of 2025’s global GO Fest event!</p>
<ul>
<li>Premier Balls will be more effective at catching Pokémon after raids.</li>
<li>Party Power will charge faster in raids.</li>
</ul>
<p>Please note that the Ancients Recovered Global Challenge will run from Sunday, June 22, at 1:00 p.m. PDT (20:00 UTC) to June 27, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PDT (20:00 UTC).</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Event Bonuses</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><ul>
<li>Remote Raid Pass limit increased to 30 from Monday, June 23, to Thursday, June 26, 2025.</li>
<li>No Remote Raid limit from Friday, June 27, to Sunday, June 29, 2025.</li>
<li>Trainers level 31 and up are guaranteed to receive Candy XL for trading Pokémon from June 23 at 10:00 a.m. local time to June 29 at 11:59 p.m. local time.</li>
<li>Trainers can receive special event stickers from PokéStops and Gifts.</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Special Offers on the Pokémon GO Web Store</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Starting June 23, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. PDT, there will be marvelous deals available on the <a href="https://store.pokemongolive.com/?utm_source=PGO&utm_medium=Blog&utm_campaign=Blog_202505_GOFest2025Leadup">Pokémon GO Web Store</a>!</p>
<p>For US$4.99, the GO Fest Ultra Storage Box will feature one Item Bag upgrade, one Pokémon Storage upgrade, one Remote Raid Pass, one Premium Battle Pass, one Incubator, and one Super Incubator.</p>
<p>For US$7.99, the GO Fest Battle Box will feature 10 Premium Battle Passes, three Remote Raid Passes, one Max Particle Pack, and one Silver Pinap Berry.</p>
<p>For US$19.99, the GO Fest Ultra Raid Box will feature 40 Premium Battle Passes and three Remote Raid Passes</p>
<p>For US$39.99, the GO Fest Hatcher Box will feature 25 Incubators, 30 Super Incubators, and two Poffins.</p>
<p>Finally, for US$99.99, the GO Fest Ultimate Box will feature 60 Incubators, 60 Super Incubators, 30 Premium Battle Passes, three Remote Raid Passes, and three Max Particle Packs.</p>
<p>All prices listed may also be in the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p>Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.</p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

            </div>

events.title: Join the merriment this summer during Serene Retreat, Instrumental Wonders, and Phantom Ruins!
events.subtitle: Serene Retreat
bonuses:
The following bonuses will be active from Friday, May 30, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, June 3, at 8:00 p.m. local time.

1/2 Hatch Distance
1.5× Hatch XP
Max Particle collection limit increased to 1,600
8× Max Particles from Power Spots
Increased chance to hatch Shiny Munna and encounter Shiny Munna in research task rewards
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Morelull in the wild and in research task rewards

Trainers with a Serene Retreat ticket will also receive the following bonus for the duration of the event.

1.5× Hatch Stardust


The following bonuses will be active from Saturday, June 7, at 10:00 a.m. to Wednesday, June 11, at 8:00 p.m. local time

Additional 5,000 XP awarded for successful raids
Max Particle collection limit increased to 1,600
8× Max Particles from Power Spots
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Ferroseed and Shiny Falinks

Trainers with an Instrumental Wonders ticket will also receive the following bonus for the duration of the event.

2× Raid Stardust


The following bonuses will be active from Saturday, June 14, at 10:00 a.m. to Wednesday, June 18, at 8:00 p.m. local time

Incense will attract certain Pokémon more frequently
2× Catch XP
Max Particle collection limit increased to 1,600
8× Max Particles from Power Spots
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Gothita and Shiny Phantump

Trainers with a Phantom Ruins ticket will also receive the following bonus for the duration of the event.

2× Catch Stardust

originalPost.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>

h3{font-size:26px}}.post--halloween-2021 .MarkdownBlock{margin-top:40px}.post--halloween-2021 .MarkdownBlock .MarkdownBlock{margin-top:20px}@media(max-width: 599px){.post--halloween-2021 ul,.post--halloween-2021 ol{padding-left:20px}}@media(min-width: 1024px){.post--gobattleleague-season10 #guaranteed-encounters .ContainerBlock__blocks{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;-moz-column-gap:24px;column-gap:24px}}details#lovecup-red[open] summary::after,details#lovecup-pink[open] summary::after{content:"";position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;background:rgba(0,0,0,.3);z-index:100}details#lovecup-red details-dialog,details#lovecup-pink details-dialog{position:fixed;margin:10vh auto;top:0;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);z-index:999;max-height:70vh;max-width:90vw;width:448px;overflow:auto;background:#fff;padding:40px 20px;border-radius:8px;box-sizing:border-box}details#lovecup-red .gbls10dialog__title,details#lovecup-pink .gbls10dialog__title{font-size:1.5em;font-weight:bold}@media(min-width:       <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            May 22, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Join the merriment this summer during Serene Retreat, Instrumental Wonders, and Phantom Ruins!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Join the merriment this summer during Serene Retreat, Instrumental Wonders, and Phantom Ruins! " class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/vrmagD1fdV_det-jVbf2OMPH0_0gR6ZBpSD37pWPy5A_ey0mO-CRTR-VsQw-BXnluIsn0jEZc1k7maoExD5CBD15OQgXfVTmQahjbGXn7Ri5RA=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Serene Retreat</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Friday, May 30, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, June 3, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ImageBlock">
        

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/elH53afhBgYb_KkoYfukvWkEJ3Xr3vukxajMCMVRTkw-XLYDxu62kKsoBXoK13hVNawZ6iHqHIkOtZ8TDEBPSlCpc7ERv0qp6_kyp5XdSWeP4w=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>


      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Wild Encounters</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will appear more frequently in the wild. </p>
<p>Chansey*<br>Marill*<br>Furfrou*<br>Cutiefly*<br>Morelull*<br>Komala*<br>Hatenna</p>
<p>Some Trainers might even encounter the following!<br>Snorlax*<br>Chimecho*</p>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Eggs</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will hatch from 2 km Eggs.</p>
<p>Chingling*<br>Munna*<br>Spritzee*<br>Swirlix*</p>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">The following Pokémon will make its Pokémon GO Gigantamax debut in six-star Max Battles!</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Gigantamax Rillaboom</p>
<p>Saturday, May 31, at 6:00 a.m. to Sunday, June 1, 2025, at 9:00 p.m. local time</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Collection Challenges</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Complete event-themed Collection Challenges to receive reward encounters and more!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Bonuses</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following bonuses will be active from Friday, May 30, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, June 3, at 8:00 p.m. local time.</p>
<ul>
<li>1/2 Hatch Distance</li>
<li>1.5× Hatch XP</li>
<li>Max Particle collection limit increased to 1,600</li>
<li>8× Max Particles from Power Spots</li>
<li>Increased chance to hatch Shiny Munna and encounter Shiny Munna in research task rewards</li>
<li>Increased chance to encounter Shiny Morelull in the wild and in research task rewards</li>
</ul>
<p>Trainers with a Serene Retreat ticket will also receive the following bonus for the duration of the event.</p>
<ul>
<li>1.5× Hatch Stardust</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Field Research Task Encounters</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>The following Pokémon will be available to encounter when you complete certain Field Research tasks. </p>
<p>Munna*<br>Cutiefly*<br>Morelull*<br>Komala*<br>Hatenna</p>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Paid Timed Research</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Timed Research will also be available for US$1.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency). This Timed Research will give Trainers tasks focused on exploration and catching Pokémon.</p>
<ul>
<li>Encounters with Munna*</li>
<li>Encounters with Morelull*</li>
<li>Two Super Incubators</li>
</ul>
<p>*If you’re lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!</p>

>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Hear ye, hear ye! Grab your tickets now!</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Tickets for Pokémon GO Fest 2025 are <a href="https://tickets.nianticlabs.com/events/pgo">here</a>! </p>
<p>The grand global revel known as Pokémon GO Fest has returned for a new year of splendid activities! Team up with Trainers near and far to discover new Pokémon and partake in the merriment this summer.</p>
<p>On June 28 and 29, 2025, Trainers can gear up for a worldwide adventure during Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Global. Though no ticket is required to participate in this global event, Trainers may upgrade their experience with an event ticket to unlock additional bonuses and Special Research—including an encounter with Volcanion!</p>
<p>But do make haste, and commence your arrangements!</p>
</div>

  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #F5F5DC"

      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Looking for other Trainers to play with?</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>If you’re looking for Trainers in your area to trade, battle, or join raids during these events or GO Fest 2025: Global, check out our Community Day map! Here you can find Community Ambassador events and local parks.</p>
<p>Community Ambassadors receive support from Niantic to run Pokémon GO events for their communities. If there are no Community Ambassadors near you, you can also search Campfire to find meetups in your area.</p>
<p>The parks marked on the Community Day map are historically popular places for Trainers to gather during Community Day. They could be a fun option to play with your local community while enjoying some fresh air.* We hope this map helps Trainers connect!</p>
</div>

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            May 19, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Join together with Trainers to complete the Might and Mastery Finale: Strength in Numbers Global Challenge</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Join together with Trainers to complete the Might and Mastery Finale: Strength in Numbers Global Challenge" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/ro9mZzsmw0HMRKM7Sm8BiV5XCkYrXzb08GCRHWV0ezznA-JQAiy2VPXnyrKAfYceF2XtR7fxqhMo-JNMjejpDiGjqDRunrLJ0MNNinAdUFVLiQ=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #A7D5A1" 
>
  
    <h2 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Might and Mastery Finale: Strength in Numbers Global Challenge</span>
    </h2>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Tues, May 20, at 12:00 a.m. PDT to Thursday, May 22, at 12:00 p.m. PDT</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Global Challenge</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Get ready for the Might and Mastery Finale: Strength in Numbers Global Challenge! Band together with fellow Trainers from around the world to master this challenge by sending Gifts to your friends in Pokémon GO! How many Gifts can you send?</p>
<p>Bonus Active During Challenge</p>
<ul>
<li>Trainers can open up to 50 Gifts per day until the Global Challenge ends on Thursday, May 22, at 12:00 p.m. PDT.</li>
</ul>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #ffffff" 
>
  
    <h3 class="ContainerBlock__headline">
      
      <span class="ContainerBlock__headline__title">Reward for Global Challenge</span>
    </h3>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>After the challenge is completed, all Trainers will unlock the ability to gift free Special Research tickets for <a href="https://pokemongolive.com/post/communitydayclassic-may-2025-machop">May 2025 Community Day Classic: Machop</a>, which takes place on Saturday, May 24, 2025, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time.*</p>
<p>The giftable tickets will be available in the Pokémon GO in-game shop from May 23 at 10:00 a.m. (or earlier!) until May 24 at 5:00 p.m. local time.</p>
<p>Trainers will be able to gift these Special Research tickets to any of their Pokémon GO friends that they have achieved a Friendship level of Great Friends or higher with.** </p>
<p>For additional details on how to gift an event ticket, please <a href="https://niantic.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-pokemon-go/faq/3400-purchasing-tickets-as-gifts-for-other-trainers">visit the Pokémon GO Help Center</a>. Trainers do not need to purchase this ticket in order to gift it.</p>
<p>*Trainers can gift up to 20 tickets per day<br>**Certain restrictions apply. Gifting cannot be completed if the recipient has purchased the event ticket or has been gifted one already.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.</p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

            </div>

                <img alt="Twitter" src="/img/social/square/twitter.svg"/>
              </a>

      <main id="main" class="main">
        
  <div class="blogPost">
    <div class="blogPost__grid grid">
      <div class="blogPost__grid__content">
        <div class="blogPost__header">
          <div class="blogPost__header__icon">
            <img src="/img/global/ball.png" alt="Pokéball icon">
          </div>
          <a class="blogPost__header__title" href="/en/post/">UPDATES</a>
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__publishDate">
          
          
            
            May 16, 2025
          
        </div>

        <div class="blogPost__post">
          
            <h2 class="blogPost__title">Evolve your GO Fest experience in Jersey City with the all-new Premier Access add-on!</h2>

            
            <div class="image">
              
                <img alt="Evolve your GO Fest experience in Jersey City with the all-new Premier Access add-on!" class="image__image" src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/1-HDRYSvJzIyJTT4oyx6ikhg1pyjBv6gLTGV9p1RtxSgP1mi9uOprG9HY9U7PZlPEMJgZg3PuIvd6Ovp5e7W-53ZQUhXf9ocyfLzHK-Me-40Kns=w1440-e365"/>
              
            </div>
            
          

          

          
            <div class="blogPost__post__blocks">
              
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>Trainers,</p>
<p>We are thrilled to kick off celebrations at Pokémon GO Fest: Jersey City in a few short weeks. Today, we are introducing an add-on enhancement for your park session. The all-new <strong>Premier Access</strong> add-on will offer an enhanced event experience for Trainers while they enjoy gameplay at Liberty State Park. This add-on is exclusively available for ticket holders attending Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Jersey City. Available starting today on the <a href="https://tickets.nianticlabs.com/events/#/login?returnUrl=%2Feventlisting&appId=pgo">Niantic Live Events Ticketing</a> site.</p>
</div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
   style="--background: #51514f;--textColor: #E6D6AC" 
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p><strong>Price: US$100</strong></p>
<p>The Park Session enhancements include but are not limited to the following.</p>
<li>Expedited entry to Pokémon Center Pop-Up Store to keep you on the go.</li>
  
<li>Entry to the Premier Access lounge, featuring upgraded restrooms, portable charger kiosks with lockers, and seating to recharge yourself for your next adventure.</li>
  
<li>An exclusive lapel pin collectible available for pickup at the Premier Access lounge (limit one pin per Premier Access add-on holder).</li> 
 
<p>Trainers will also obtain voucher codes for the following in-game items. The codes will be sent via email no later than Thursday, June 5, 2025.</p>
<ul>
 <li> 100 Poké Balls 
 <li> 100 Great Balls 
 <li> 100 Ultra Balls 
 <li> 50 Silver Pinap Berries 
 <li> 100 Super Incubators 
 <li> 10 Lucky Eggs 
 <li> 10 Incense 
 <li> 10 Star Pieces 
 <li> 10 Lure Modules 
 <li> 10 Glacial Lure Modules 
 <li> 10 Magnetic Lure Modules 
 <li> 10 Mossy Lure Modules 
 <li> 10 Rainy Lure Modules 
 <li> 100 Premium Battle Passes 
 <li> 20 Max Particle Packs 
 <li> 5 Max Mushrooms
</ul>
  </li>
<ul></div>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__blocks">
      
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p>*Voucher codes will expire on December 31, 2025, at 23:59 UTC.</p>
</div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ContainerBlock">
        <div
  class="ContainerBlock"
  
  
>
  
  
    <div class="ContainerBlock__body"><p>A limited number of Premier Access add-ons will be available for Trainers looking to evolve their park session experience. The Premier Access add-on is only active during your ticketed event day and park session time. It does not include additional Special Research or Timed Research. A ticket to Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Jersey City is a prerequisite for this add-on.</p>
<p>If a Trainer purchases this add-on on their ticketed event day, they will receive their voucher code redemption email shortly after the transaction is completed. Supplies are limited, and sales for each event day will close in the morning.</p>
</div>
  
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--ImageBlock">
        

  <div class="ImageBlock">
    
      <img
        src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/ZSAlqISg0FRkagBc6FUgHmIfcC4PXyEJAinXPovjYi9wuI86HoDziEH7rVwMcnnteHDveApTeNuVWgg6WFl9cnPuOe-zAEVIoA9cP9UH0FBN=e365-s0"
        
      >
    
  </div>


      </div>
    
  

    </div>
  
</div>

      </div>
    
  
    
    
      <div class="block block--CopyBlock">
        <div class="CopyBlock">
  
    <div class="CopyBlock__content"><p>Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.</p>
<p><strong>—The Pokémon GO team</strong></p>
</div>
  
</div>
